MISSION_AREA_E_4_DESC.ms: Membantu orang awam amat penting. Kita mahu negara menjadi kuat bagi kempen masa hadapan.

MISSION_AREA_E_4_COMPLETION.xx: Well done, commander! The nation rejoices!
MISSION_AREA_E_4_COMPLETION.en: Well done, Commander! The nation rejoices!
MISSION_AREA_E_4_COMPLETION.de: Gut gemacht, Kommandant! Die Nation jubelt!
MISSION_AREA_E_4_COMPLETION.fr: Bien jou, commandant ! La population est en liesse !
MISSION_AREA_E_4_COMPLETION.it: Ben fatto, comandante! La nazione gioisce.
MISSION_AREA_E_4_COMPLETION.es: Bien hecho. La nacin lo agradece!
MISSION_AREA_E_4_COMPLETION.pt: Bom trabalho, Comandante! A nao rejubila!

MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.xx: Click on a city and provide supplies of your choice to them.
MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.en: Provide Supplies to cities of your choice and collect the Cash when time runs out.
MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.de: Versorge Stdte deiner Wahl mit Wehrmaterial und sammle Geld ein, wenn die Zeit abluft.
MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.fr: Ravitaille les villes de ton choix et rcupre le cash  la fin du dlai.
MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.it: Fornisci rifornimenti a delle citt a tua scelta e raccogli i contanti allo scadere del tempo.
MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.es: Entrega suministros a las ciudades que quieras y recoge el dinero cuando se agote el tiempo.
MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.pt: Fornece suprimentos s cidades que escolheres e recebe Dinheiro quando o tempo acabar.
MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.tr: Tercihinize gre malzeme tedarik etmek iin bir ehre tklayn ve sre dolduunda Nakit Para'y toplayn.
MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.id: Berikan Suplai ke kota pilihanmu dan kumpulkan Uang saat waktu habis.
MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.ms: Beri Bekalan kepada bandar pilihan dan kutip Wang apabila masa tiba.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_INTRO.en: Hello Commander, I am the leader of the Eastern District resistance movement. Glad you're with us!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_INTRO.de: Hallo Kommandant, ich bin der Anfhrer der Widerstandsbewegung im stlichen Distrikt. Ich bin froh, dass Sie uns beistehen!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_INTRO.fr: Bonjour Commandant, je suis le chef du mouvement de rsistance du District est. Content de vous avoir avec nous !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_INTRO.it: Salve comandante, sono il leader del movimento di resistenza del distretto orientale. Felice che tu sia dei nostri!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_INTRO.es: Hola, comandante. Soy el lder del movimiento rebelde del distrito este. Me alegro de que ests con nosotros!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_INTRO.pt: Ol Comandante, eu sou o lder do movimento de resistncia da Regio Oriental. Ainda bem que ests connosco!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_INTRO.tr: Merhaba Kumandan, ben Dou Blgesi direni hareketinin lideriyim. Bizimle birlikte olduunuz iin mutluyum!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_INTRO.id: Halo Komandan, aku pimpinan gerakan perlawanan Distrik Timur! Senang Anda bisa bergabung dengan kami!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_INTRO.ms: Helo Komander, saya ketua pejuang Eastern District. Sukacita tuan bersama kami!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_TITLE.es: Perdigones en el campo de batalla

MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_DESC.en: Our resistance isn't equipped to take out Fierce's Rocket Batteries and we're taking huge losses! Can you help us?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_DESC.de: Unsere Widerstandsbewegung kann gegen Fierces Raketenbatterien nur wenig ausrichten und erleidet daher starke Verluste! Knnen Sie uns helfen?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_DESC.fr: Nos hommes ne sont pas quips pour affronter les batteries de roquettes, nos pertes sont importantes ! Aide-nous !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_DESC.it: La nostra resistenza non  equipaggiata per eliminare le batteire di missili di Fierce e stiamo subendo gravi perdite. Ci puoi aiutare?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_DESC.es: Nuestra resistencia no est equipada para enfrentarse a las bateras de misiles de Fierce y estamos sufriendo grandes prdidas. Puedes ayudarnos?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_DESC.pt: A nossa resistncia no est equipada para enfrentar as minhas terrestres do Fierce e estamos a sofrer baixas enormes! Podes ajudar-nos?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_DESC.tr: Direniimiz, Fierce'n Roket Bataryalarn indirecek gte deil ve byk kayplar veriyoruz. Bize yardm edebilir misin?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_DESC.id: Perlawanan kami tidak cukup kuat menahan Peluncur Roket Fierce dan korban kami berjatuhan! Bisakah kau membantu kami?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_DESC.ms: Kami tidak kuat untuk melawan Pelancar Roket Fierce dan kami kalah teruk! Boleh bantu kami?

MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_COMPLETION.en: Thank you! Our resistance grows stronger every day, especially now that there are less Rocket Battery support!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_COMPLETION.de: Vielen Dank! Unsere Widerstandsbewegung wird von Tag zu Tag strker. Vor allem deshalb, weil die Raketenbatterien weniger werden.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_COMPLETION.fr: Merci ! La rsistance se renforce chaque jour, depuis que les batteries sont dtruites !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_COMPLETION.it: Grazie! La nostra resistenza diventa ogni giorno pi forte, soprattutto ora che le batterie di missili di supporto sono diminuite!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_COMPLETION.es: Gracias! Nuestra resistencia crece cada da ms, sobre todo ahora, que han disminuido las bateras de misiles.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_COMPLETION.pt: Obrigada! A nossa resistncia cresce de dia para dia, especialmente agora que h menos apoio das Baterias de Rockets!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_COMPLETION.tr: Teekkrler! Direniimiz her gn daha da byyor, zellikle de daha az Roket Bataryas destekleri varken!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_COMPLETION.id: Terima kasih! Perlawanan kami bertambah kuat, apalagi setelah serangan Peluncur Roket berkurang!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_COMPLETION.ms: Terima kasih! Perjuangan kami menjadi kuat hari ke hari, tambahan pula sudah kurang pelancar roket!

MISSION_COMBAT_E1_OBJ1_DESC.en: Take out the Fierce's Rocket Batteries around the region.
MISSION_COMBAT_E1_OBJ1_DESC.de: Schalte Fierces Raketenbatterien in der Region aus.
MISSION_COMBAT_E1_OBJ1_DESC.fr: Dtruis les redoutables batteries de roquettes.
MISSION_COMBAT_E1_OBJ1_DESC.it: Elimina le batterie di missili di Fierce nella regione.
MISSION_COMBAT_E1_OBJ1_DESC.es: Elimina las bateras de misiles de Fierce por toda la regin.
MISSION_COMBAT_E1_OBJ1_DESC.pt: Elimina as Baterias de Rockets do Fierce da regio.
MISSION_COMBAT_E1_OBJ1_DESC.tr: Fierce'n blge yaknlarndaki Roket Bataryalarn yok et
MISSION_COMBAT_E1_OBJ1_DESC.id: Musnahkan Peluncur Roket Fierce di sekitar kawasan.
MISSION_COMBAT_E1_OBJ1_DESC.ms: Musnahkan pelancar Roket Fierce di sekeliling.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO.en: You have no idea how much you're helping the resistance. We can't thank you enough!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO.de: Sie knnen sich nicht vorstellen, wie sehr sie der Widerstandsbewegung helfen. Wir knnen Ihnen gar nicht genug danken!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO.fr: Vos n'avez pas ide combien vous aidez la rsistance. Vous avez notre gratitude !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO.it: Non sai quanto il tuo aiuto sia prezioso per la resistenza. Non ti ringrazieremo mai abbastanza!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO.es: No tienes ni idea de cunto te agradecemos lo que ests haciendo por la resistencia.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO.pt: No fazes ideia de quanto est a ajudar a resistncia. Estamos muito gratos!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO.tr: Direnie ne kadar yardm ettiini bilemezsin. Ne kadar teekkr etsek az!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO.id: Betapa besar bantuanmu terhadap perlawanan kami. Terima kasih saja rasanya belum cukup!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO.ms: Anda tak tahu banyak mana anda telah bantu kami. Kami tidak akan dapat membalasnya!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO2.en: We've received reports that Enemy APCs are transferring some important Enemy Intel. We don't know what it is, but it must be something big!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO2.de: Unseren Berichten zufolge berbringen Feindliche Transportpanzer wichtige Feindesberichte. Worum es geht, wissen wir nicht, aber es muss etwas sehr wichtiges sein!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO2.fr: Nos espions nous indiquent que des blinds ennemis transportent d'importants renseignements. Nous ignorons de quoi il s'agit, mais c'est du lourd !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO2.it: Ci hanno informato che i VTT del nemico trasportano informazioni importanti. Non sappiamo di cosa si tratta, ma deve essere qualcosa di grosso!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO2.es: Hemos recibido informes que indican que los APC enemigos estn transportando inteligencia importante sobre el enemigo. No sabemos de qu se trata, pero seguro que de algo muy interesante.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO2.pt: Recebemos relatrios de que os APCs Inimigos esto a transferir Informaes importantes do Inimigo. No sabemos o que , mas deve ser algo grande!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO2.tr: Aldmz raporlara gre Dman APC'leri baz nemli Dman stihbarat tayor. Ne olduunu bilmiyoruz ama byk bir ey olmal!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO2.id: Kami menerima laporan bahwa APC Musuh mengirim Info penting. Kami tidak tahu apa isinya tapi pasti info yang maha penting!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO2.ms: Kami dapat laporan bahawa APC musuh sedang membawa Risikan musuh yang penting. Tak tahulah apa dia, tapi ia mestilah sesuatu yang besar!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_DESC.en: Enemy APCs are transferring some important Enemy Intel. You should ambush them and grab the cargo!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_DESC.de: Feindliche Transportpanzer berbringen wichtige Feindesberichte. Greif Sie an und schnapp dir die Fracht!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_DESC.fr: Des blinds ennemis convoient d'importants renseignements. Tends-le une embuscade et rcupre la marchandise !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_DESC.it: I VTT nemici trasportano importanti informazioni sul nemico. Devi tendergli un'imboscata e rubare il carico!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_DESC.es: Unos APC enemigos estn transportando inteligencia importante acerca del enemigo. Deberas tenderles una emboscada y obtener esa informacin.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_DESC.pt: APCs Inimigos esto a transferir Informaes importantes do Inimigo. Devias embosc-los e apanhar a carga!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_DESC.tr: Dman APC'leri baz nemli Dman stihbarat tayor. Pusuya drmeli ve kargoyu kapmalsn!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_DESC.id: APC Musuh mengirim beberapa Info penting. Kau harus menyergap mereka dan merampas muatannya!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_DESC.ms: APC Musuh sedang membawa Risikan Musuh yang penting. Serang hendap mereka dan bawa kargo!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_COMPLETION.en: You've done it! Let's crack 'em open and see what's inside...
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_COMPLETION.de: Du hast es geschafft! Brechen wir sie auf und sehen nach, was sich darin befindet ...
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_COMPLETION.fr: Tu as russi ! Ouvrons a et voyons un peu...
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_COMPLETION.it: Ce l'hai fatta! Apriamolo e vediamo cosa c' dentro...
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_COMPLETION.es: Lo has conseguido! Vamos a ver qu contienen y si nos sirve de algo...
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_COMPLETION.pt: Conseguiste! Vamos abri-los e ver o que est la dentro...
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_COMPLETION.tr: Baardn! Aalm ve iinde ne varm grelim...
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_COMPLETION.id: Kau berhasil! Mari kita buka dan ketahui isinya...
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_COMPLETION.ms: Anda dah berjaya melakukannya! Mari kita buka dan lihat apa di dalam

MISSION_COMBAT_E2_OBJ1_DESC.en: Take out the Enemy APCs and see if they're carrying something of importance.
MISSION_COMBAT_E2_OBJ1_DESC.de: Schalte die Feindlichen Transportpanzer aus und sieh nach, ob sie irgendwas wichtiges transportieren.
MISSION_COMBAT_E2_OBJ1_DESC.fr: Dtruis les blinds ennemis et vrifions les informations.
MISSION_COMBAT_E2_OBJ1_DESC.it: Elimina i VTT nemici e scopri se trasportano qualcosa di importante.
MISSION_COMBAT_E2_OBJ1_DESC.es: Elimina los APC enemigos y comprueba si llevaban informacin importante.
MISSION_COMBAT_E2_OBJ1_DESC.pt: Destri os APCs Inimigos e v se transportam alguma coisa importante.
MISSION_COMBAT_E2_OBJ1_DESC.tr: Dman APC'lerini imha et ve nemli bir ey tayp tamadklarna bak.
MISSION_COMBAT_E2_OBJ1_DESC.id: Hancurkan APC Musuh dan cari tahu apakah mereka membawa sesuatu yang berharga.
MISSION_COMBAT_E2_OBJ1_DESC.ms: Musnahkan APC Musuh dan periksa jika mereka membawa sesuatu yang penting

MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_OUTRO.en: Unfortunately there wasn't any Intel, but we did find some of Fierce's blood money and weapons! We must return these to the people!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_OUTRO.de: Leider hatten sie keine Berichte dabei. Wir fanden jedoch einen Teil von Fierce Blutgeld und Waffen! Wir mssen die dem Volk zurckgeben!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_OUTRO.fr: Malheureusement, ils ne transportaient aucun renseignement, mais nous avons les armes et l'argent de Fierce ! Distribuons-les au peuple !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_OUTRO.it: Purtroppo non c'erano informazioni, ma abbiamo trovato i soldi sporchi di Fierce e delle armi! Dobbiamo restituire tutto alla gente!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_OUTRO.es: Por desgracia, no se trataba de informacin, pero al menos hemos dado con dinero sucio y armas de Fierce. Tenemos que devolvrselo al pueblo.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_OUTRO.pt: Infelizmente no havia Informaes, mas encontrmos algum dinheiro sujo e armas do Fierce! Temos de os devolver ao povo!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_OUTRO.tr: Maalesef hi stihbarat yoktu ama Fierce'un kanl paralarnn ve silahlarnn bir ksmn bulduk! Bunlar halka iade etmeliyiz!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_OUTRO.id: Sayangnya tidak ada Info, tapi kita menemukan uang dan senjata Fierce! Kita harus mengembalikannya kepada warga!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_OUTRO.ms: Malangnya tiada Risikan, tetapi kita jumpa banyak wang haram dan persenjataan Fierce! Kita mesti pulangkan kepada rakyat!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO.en: Our radio operators have intercepted a garbled enemy transmission!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO.de: Unsere Funker haben eine verstmmelte bertragung des Feindes abgefangen.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO.fr: Nos oprateurs radio ont intercept une transmission brouille !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO.it: I nostri operatori radio hanno intercettato uno stralcio di un messaggio del nemico!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO.es: Nuestros operadores de radio han interceptado una transmisin enemiga codificada.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO.pt: Os nossos operadores de rdio interceptaram uma transmisso de rdio truncada!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO.tr: Telsiz operatrlerimiz kark bir dman yayn yakalad.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO.id: Operator radio kita telah menangkap transmisi komunikasi musuh yang samar!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO.ms: Operator radio kita dapat memintas transmisi musuh yang tidak berapa jelas!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO2.en: ... *KCH* and your ord*TCHK* attack immediately, do y*TRRRR*...*KCH*
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO2.de: ... *KZZ* und Ihr Befe*KRZZ* sofort anzugreifen, mach*TRRRR*...*KZZ*
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO2.fr: ... *KCH* et votre ord*TCHK* attaque immdiate, faites*TRRRR*...*KCH*
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO2.it: ... *KCH* e il tuo ord*TCHK* attaccare immediatamente, hai *TRRRR*...*KCH*
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO2.es: ... *CLIC* y tus rde... *CLIC* atacar inmediatamente, has... *CLIC* *BIIIP*
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO2.pt: ... *KCH* e as vossas ord*TCHK* atacar imediatamente, compre*TRRRR*...*KCH*
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO2.id: ... *KCH* dan perint*TCHK* segera menyerang, apa ka*TRRRR*...*KCH*
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO2.ms: ... *KCH* dan arahan*TCHK* serang segera, dengar ta*TRRRR*...*KCH*

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO3.en: Looks like they're planning some kind of attack! We need to get some defenses up fast!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO3.de: Sie scheinen eine Angriff vorzubereiten! Wir mssen unsere Verteidigungen hochfahren!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO3.fr: On dirait qu'ils prparent une offensive ! Prparons nos dfenses !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO3.it: Sembra stiano pianificando un attacco! Dobbiamo organizzare le difese e in fretta!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO3.es: Parece que estn planeando algn tipo de ataque. Necesitamos avisar a nuestras defensas de la situacin, y rpido!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO3.pt: Parece que esto a planear um ataque! Temos de montar algumas defesas rapidamente!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO3.tr: Grne gre bir saldr planlyorlar! Hzlca savunma oluturmamz gerekiyor!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO3.id: Nampaknya mereka berencana melakukan serangan! Kita perlu segera membuat pertahanan!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO3.ms: Nampaknya mereka sedang merancang serangan! Kita perlu membina pertahanan cepat!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_TITLE.de: Mach dich auf den Einschlag gefasst!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_DESC.en: It seems that Fierce is planning a major offensive, and soon! Build some defenses to prepare.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_DESC.de: Fierce scheint eine groe Offensive vorzubereiten, die bald losschlagen soll. Bau Verteidigungen, um vorbereitet zu sein.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_DESC.fr: On dirait que Fierce prpare une offensive ! Construis des lignes dfensives.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_DESC.it: Sembra che Fierce stia organizzando una massiccia controffensiva! Costruisci strutture difensive.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_DESC.es: Parece que Fierce est preparando un gran ataque, y ser dentro de poco. Ser mejor que refuerces las defensas con las que contamos.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_DESC.pt: Parece que o Fierce est a planear uma grande ofensiva para breve! Constri algumas defesas para te preparares.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_DESC.tr: Grne gre Fierce byk bir saldr planlyor, hem de ok yaknda! Hazrlanmak iin savunma ina et.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_DESC.id: Nampaknya tak lama lagi Fierce merencanakan serangan skala besar! Bangun pertahanan sebagai persiapan.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_DESC.ms: Nampaknya Fierce merancang serangan besar-besaran, dan tak lama lagi! Bina pertahahan untuk bersedia.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_COMPLETION.en: Good work! Hopefully we can hold this ground!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_COMPLETION.de: Gute Arbeit! Hoffentlich knnen wir standhalten!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_COMPLETION.fr: Bien jou ! Esprons que a fera l'affaire !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_COMPLETION.it: Bel lavoro! Speriamo di riuscire a tenere la posizione!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_COMPLETION.es: Buen trabajo. Esperemos que logren resistir el ataque.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_COMPLETION.pt: Bom trabalho! Com sorte conseguiremos defender este terreno!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_COMPLETION.tr: yi iti! Umarz bu topraklar elimizde tutabiliriz!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_COMPLETION.id: Bagus! Semoga kita bisa mempertahankan posisi ini!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_COMPLETION.ms: Bagus! Harap-harap kita boleh bertahan di sini!

MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.xx: Buy and place shooting defense installations to secure the perimeter.
MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.en: Buy and position Defensive Fire Installations to secure the perimeter.
MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.de: Kaufe und platziere Verteidigungsanlagen gegen Schsse, um den Verteidigungsring zu sichern.
MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.fr: Achte et place des installations dfensives dotes d'une capacit de tir pour scuriser le primtre.
MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.it: Acquista e posiziona le installazioni difensive per rendere sicuro il perimetro.
MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.es: Compra instalaciones defensivas que disparen y colcalas para asegurar el permetro.
MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.pt: Compra e coloca instalaes de Fogo Defensivo para proteger o permetro.
MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.tr: evreyi korumak iin ate eden savunma tesisleri satn al ve yerletir.
MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.id: Beli dan posisikan Instalasi Pertahanan Tembakan untuk mengamankan batas.
MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.ms: Beli dan letakkan pertahanan serang balas untuk menjaga sempadan.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_INTRO.en: It's suspiciously quiet near the border... Is it possible they're not coming?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_INTRO.de: An der Grenze ist es verdchtig ruhig ... Ist es mglich, dass sie doch nicht kommen?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_INTRO.fr: C'est trangement calme prs de la frontire... et s'ils ne venaient pas ?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_INTRO.it: C' una strana calma nella zona di confine... Possibile che non arrivino pi?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_INTRO.es: La frontera est bastante tranquila, y eso me resulta sospechoso. Es que el enemigo no piensa venir?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_INTRO.pt: Junto da fronteira reina um silncio suspeito... Ser possvel que eles no vo aparecer?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_INTRO.tr: pheli bir ekilde snr civar sessiz... Gelmeme ihtimalleri var m?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_INTRO.id: Agak tenang di sekitar perbatasan... Apa mungkin mereka tidak akan datang?
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_INTRO.ms: Dekat sempadan begitu senyap sunyi.mungkinkah mereka tidak akan datang?

MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_DESC.en: Now that our defenses are up, try taking some of Fierce's territory to lure him into attacking!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_DESC.de: Unsere Verteidigung steht. Versuch jetzt, Fierce etwas von seinem Gelnde abzuluchsen, um ihn zum Angriff zu verleiten!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_DESC.fr: Nos dfenses sont en pace, essaie de lui prendre du terrain pour le pousser  attaquer !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_DESC.it: Ora che le nostre difese sono pronte, prova a prendere qualche territorio di Fierce, per costringerlo ad attaccare!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_DESC.es: Ahora que hemos mejorado nuestras defensas, vamos a intentar hacernos con territorio enemigo para que nos ataquen.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_DESC.pt: Agora que as nossas defesas esto montadas, experimenta conquistar algum territrio do Fierce para o convencer a atacar!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_DESC.tr: Savunmamz ayakta olduuna gre, saldrmas iin kkrtmak amacyla Fierce'un topraklarndan bir ksmn almaya al!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_DESC.id: Pertahanan sudah siap, cobalah duduki wilayah Fierce dan pancing dia menyerang!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_DESC.ms: Sekarang pertahanan kita sudah dibina, cuba ambil beberapa kawasan musuh untuk mengumpannya!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_COMPLETION.en: Enemy transmissions are going crazy! I think they're coming!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_COMPLETION.de: Die Feindlichen bertragungen hren gar nicht mehr auf! Ich glaube, sie kommen!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_COMPLETION.fr: Transmissions ennemies en effervescence ! Je crois qu'ils arrivent !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_COMPLETION.it: Le trasmissioni del nemico sono impazzite! Credo stiano arrivando!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_COMPLETION.es: Las comunicaciones del enemigo se han disparado! Vienen a por nosotros!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_COMPLETION.pt: As transmisses do inimigo enlouqueceram! Acho que eles esto a caminho!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_COMPLETION.tr: Dman yaynlar kafay yedi! Sanrm geliyorlar!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_COMPLETION.id: Transmisi musuh sangat sibuk! Kurasa mereka akan datang!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_COMPLETION.ms: Transmisi musuh menggila! Rasanya mereka datang!

MISSION_COMBAT_E4_OBJ1_DESC.en: Move your troops into Enemy Territory to capture it.
MISSION_COMBAT_E4_OBJ1_DESC.de: Beweg deine Truppen in Feindesgelnde, um es zu erobern.
MISSION_COMBAT_E4_OBJ1_DESC.fr: Dplace tes troupes sur un territoire ennemi pour le capturer.
MISSION_COMBAT_E4_OBJ1_DESC.it: Muovi le tue truppe nel territorio nemico per conquistarlo.
MISSION_COMBAT_E4_OBJ1_DESC.es: Dirige a tus tropas a territorio enemigo para conquistarlo.
MISSION_COMBAT_E4_OBJ1_DESC.pt: Move as tuas tropas para Territrio Inimigo para o capturares.
MISSION_COMBAT_E4_OBJ1_DESC.tr: Ele geirmek zere birliklerini Dman Blgesi'ne hareket ettir.
MISSION_COMBAT_E4_OBJ1_DESC.id: Pindahkan pasukan ke Wilayah Musuh untuk mendudukinya.
MISSION_COMBAT_E4_OBJ1_DESC.ms: Gerakkan askar anda ke tempat musuh untuk menawannya.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO.en: You are such a pain! Can't you just die already!? ATTAAAACK!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO.de: Was gehst du mir doch auf den Sack! Kannst du nicht einfach sterben!? AAANGRIFFF!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO.fr: Tu me fatigues ! Tu n'a jamais pens au suicide !?  L'ATTAAAAAAQUE !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO.it: Sei terribilmente fastidioso! Non puoi morire e basta!? ALL'ATTACCO!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO.es: Eres peor que un dolor de cabeza! Por qu no te mueres de una vez? Al ataqueeee!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO.pt: s to aborrecido! No podias morrer de uma vez?! AO ATAAAAAQUE!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO.tr: Amma karn arsymsn! Hala lmedin mi? SALDIRIIIIN!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO.id: Kamu memang menyebalkan! Mati sajalah kau! SERBUUUU!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO.ms: Menyakitkan hati sungguh! Kenapa tak mati saja?! SERAAAANG!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO2.en: That conniving Fierce has secretly sabotaged Eastshire's Supplies and deployed forces on the border! We'll need to deal with both!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO2.de: Der hinterhltige Fierce hat heimlich das Wehrmaterial von Eastshire sabotiert und Truppen zur Grenze entsandt! Wir mssen uns um beide kmmern!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO2.fr: Ce fourbe de Fierce a sabot les stocks d'Eastshire et dploy ses forces sur la frontire ! Il va falloir nous occuper de tout a !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO2.it: Quel subdolo di Fierce ha sabotato segretamente i rifornimenti di Eastshire e ha schierato le sue forze lungo il confine! Dobbiamo occuparci di entrambe le cose!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO2.es: Ese confabulador de Fierce ha saboteado en secreto los suministros de Condado Levante y ha apostado tropas en la frontera. Tendremos que encargarnos de ambos asuntos.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO2.pt: Aquele ardiloso Fierce sabotou secretamente os Suprimentos de Eastshire e colocou foras na fronteira! Temos de lidar com ambos!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO2.tr: birliki Fierce, Eastshire Malzemelerini gizlice sabote etti ve snra kuvvet konulandrd! Her ikisiyle de ilgilenmeliyiz!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO2.id: Fierce yang licik itu telah menyabotase secara diam-diam Perbekalan Eastshire dan menerjunkan pasukan di perbatasan! Kita perlu menghadapi keduanya!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO2.ms: Si Fierce yang licik tu sudah curi-curi mensabotaj Bekalan Eastshire  dan menghantar tentera ke sempadan! Kita perlu menangani kedua-duanya!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_DESC.en: Fierce has taken the bait and launched an attack, but he also sabotaged Eastshire's Supplies. Handle his weak military forces while providing Eastshire with fresh Supplies.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_DESC.de: Fierce hat den Kder geschluckt und angegriffen, aber auch das Wehrmaterial von Eastshire sabotiert. Kmmer dich um seine schwachen Truppen und versorg Eastshire gleichzeitig mit neuem Wehrmaterial.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_DESC.fr: Fierce a mordu  l'hameon et lanc son attaque, mais il a aussi sabot des stocks d'Eastshire. Occupe-toi de ses troupes et envoie des ressources  Eastshire.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_DESC.it: Fierce ha abboccato e ha sferrato un attacco, ma ha anche sabotato i rifornimenti di Eastshire. Occupati delle sue deboli forze militari e contemporaneamente porta i rifornimenti a Eastshire.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_DESC.es: Fierce ha picado el anzuelo y va a atacarnos, pero tambin ha saboteado los suministros de Condado Levante. Encrgate de sus dbiles tropas mientras proporcionas suministros a Condado Levante.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_DESC.pt: Fierce mordeu o isco e lanou um ataque, mas tambm sabotou os Suprimentos de Eastshire. Lida com as suas fracas foras militares enquanto forneces novos suprimentos a Eastshire.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_DESC.tr: Fierce yemi yuttu ve bir saldr balatt fakat ayn zamanda Eastshire Malzemelerini sabote etti. Bu zayf askeri gle baa karken Eastshire'a da taze Malzeme sala.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_DESC.id: Fierce telah memakan umpannya dan meluncurkan serangan, tapi ia juga telah menyabotase Perbekalan Eastshire. Hadapi kekuatan militer lemah ini sembari memberi Perbekalan yang baru ke Eastshire.
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_DESC.ms: Fierce telah memakan umpan dan menyerang, tetapi juga mensabotaj Bekalan Eastshire. Selesaikan tenteranya yang lemah sementara memberikan Eastshire Bekalan yang segar.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_COMPLETION.en: You've simultaneously restored Eastshire's Supplies and defeated Fierce's offensive! I bow to you!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_COMPLETION.de: Du hast gleichzeitig Eastshires Wehrmaterial erneuert und Fierce Offensive besiegt. Ich verneige mich vor Euch!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_COMPLETION.fr: Tu as rempli les stocks d'Eastshire et repouss l'attaque ! Je vous tire mon chapeau !
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_COMPLETION.it: Hai rifornito Eastshire e sconfitto Fierce simultaneamente! Hai tutta la mia stima!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_COMPLETION.es: Has logrado llevar a cabo ambas tareas: proporcionar suministros a Condado Levante y derrotar a Fierce. Me quito el sombrero ante ti!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_COMPLETION.pt: Conseguiste simultaneamente repor os Suprimentos de Eastshire e derrotar a ofensiva do Fierce! Fao-te uma vnia!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_COMPLETION.tr: Ezamanl olarak hem Eastshire Malzemelerini yeniledin hem de Fierce'un saldrsn alt ettin! nnde eiliyorum!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_COMPLETION.id: Kau berhasil memulihkan Perbekalan Eastshire dan mengalahkan serangan Fierce! Selamat!
MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_COMPLETION.ms: Anda telah memulihkan bekalan ke Eastshire dan mengalahkan serangan Fierce! Saya tabik kepada anda!

MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ1_DESC.fr: Dtruis les forces de contre-attaque de Fierce.
MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ1_DESC.pt: Elimina as coras de contra-ataque do Fierce.
MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ1_DESC.tr: Fierce'un kar saldr kuvvetlerini yok et.

MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ2_DESC.en: Click on the city of Eastshire to sell Supplies and receive Cash.
MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ2_DESC.de: Klick auf die Stadt Eastshire, um Wehrmaterial zu verkaufen und Geld zu erhalten.
MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ2_DESC.fr: Clique sur la ville d'Eastshire pour lui vendre des ressources.
MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ2_DESC.it: Clicca sulla citt di Eastshire per vendere rifornimenti e ricevere contanti.
MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ2_DESC.es: Haz clic sobre la ciudad Condado Levante para venderles suministros a cambio de dinero.
MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ2_DESC.pt: Clica na cidade de Eastshire para venderes Suprimentos e receberes Dinheiro.
MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ2_DESC.tr: Malzeme satmak ve Nakit Para kazanmak iin Eastshire ehrine tkla.
MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ2_DESC.id: Klik pada kota Eastshire untuk menjual Perbekalan dan menerima Uang.
MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ2_DESC.ms: Klik bandar Eastshire untuk menjual Bekalan dan menerima wang.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_1.en: What's this? You dare challenge the great and powerful Commandant Tubman!?\nI will squash you like a bug!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_1.de: Wie bitte? Du wagst es, den groen Kommandant Tubman herauszufordern!?\nDich zermalme ich wie einen Kfer!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_1.fr: Quoi ? Tu oses dfier le puissant Commandant Tubman !?\nJe vais t'craser comme un insecte !
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_1.it: Che storia  questa? Hai osato sfidare il magnifico e potentissimo comandante Tubman!?\nTi schiaccer come una cimice!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_1.es: Cmo?... Acaso te atreves a retar al gran y poderoso comandante Tubman?\nTe aplastar como a un insecto!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_1.pt: O que  isto? Atreves-te a desafiar o grande e poderoso Comandante Tubman?!\nVou esmagar-te como um insecto!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_1.tr: Bu da ne? Byk ve gl Kumandan Tubman'a kafa m tutuyorsun!?\nSeni bir bcek gibi ezeceim!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_1.id: Apa ini? Berani benar kau menantang Komandan Tubman yang digdaya dan kuat!?\nKupencet kau seperti nyamuk!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_1.ms: Apa ni? Anda berani mencabar Komandan Tubman yang hebat lagi berkuasa?!\nSaya akan pijak seperti semut!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_2.en: Look who's here. The enemy Commandant Tubman! He's all smoke and mirrors!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_2.de: Sieh mal, wen wir hier haben. Unseren Feind "Kommandant" Tubman! Der ist nichts als Schall und Rauch!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_2.fr: Voyez-vous a. Le "Commandant" Tibman ! Tout en esbroufe !
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_2.it: Guarda chi si vede. Il "comandante" nemico Tubman! Un uomo tutto fumo...!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_2.es: Mira quin est aqu... El enemigo, el "comandante" Tubman. Es tan solo un fanfarrn y un mentiroso.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_2.pt: Olha quem est aqui. O Comandante Tubman inimigo!  tudo fumo e espelhos!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_2.tr: Kimleri gryorum? Dman Kumandan Tubman! i gc dalavere!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_2.id: Lihat siapa yang datang. "Komandan" Tubman! Ia bukan apa-apa hanya tipu muslihat semata!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_2.ms: Tengok siapa yang muncul. 'Komandan' Tubman! Dia tu muslihat saja lebih!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_3.en: Ok, listen up Commander. Here's your first Strategic Goal  It's a top secret assignment just for you and needs your utmost attention!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_3.de: Hren Sie her, Oberst. Hier ist Ihr erstes strategisches Ziel. Es ist streng geheim, allein fr Sie bestimmt und fordert ihre ganze Aufmerksamkeit!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_3.fr: Ok, on ouvre ses esgourdes. Voici le premier objectif stratgique - une mission top-secrte, prtez bien \nattention !
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_3.it: OK, ascolta comandante. Ecco il tuo primo obiettivo strategico.  una missione top secret solo per te e necessita della tua massima attenzione!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_3.es: Escucha con atencin. Tu primer objetivo estratgico es una labor de alto secreto; tan solo t sabrs de qu se trata, y has de tomrtela muy en serio.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_3.pt: Ok, preste ateno, Comandante. Aqui est o primeiro Objectivo Estratgico   uma misso ultra-secreta s para si e requer toda a tua ateno!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_3.tr: Tamam, dinle Kumandan. te ilk Stratejik Hedefin  senin iin ok gizli bir grev ve en st seviyede hassasiyet gerekiyor!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_3.id: Oke Komandan, dengarkan! Ini Sasaran Strategismu yang pertama - tugas rahasia khusus untukmu dan perlu perhatian yang sungguh-sungguh!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_3.ms: Ok, dengar sini Komander. Sini ada Matlamat Strategik yang pertama - tugasan rahsia untuk anda saja dan memerlukan perhatian anda yang penuh!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_DESC.en: With our breakthrough, Its time to strike at the heart of the region. Commander, your mission is to secure and liberate the city of Southgate and it's surroundings!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_DESC.de: Nach unserem Durchbruch ist es an der Zeit, das Herzstck der Region anzugreifen. Oberst, Ihr Auftrag ist es, die Stadt Southgate und das Umland einzunehmen und zu befreien.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_DESC.fr: C'est le moment, il est temps de frapper au cur de la rgion. Commandant, nous avons pour mission de scuriser et de librer la ville de Southgate, ainsi que sa banlieue !
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_DESC.it: Ora che siamo riusciti a penetrare,  arrivato il momento di colpire la regione al cuore. Comandante, la tua missione  liberare e mettere al sicuro la citt di Southgate e i suoi dintorni!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_DESC.es: Gracias a nuestro avance, creo que ha llegado la hora de atacar el corazn de la regin. Comandante, tu misin es liberar y proteger la ciudad de Puertaustral y sus alrededores.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_DESC.pt: Com o nosso avano,  altura de atacarmos o corao da regio. Comandante, a sua misso  tomar e libertar a cidade de Southgate e a regio em volta!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_DESC.tr: lerleyiimizle, blgenin kalbine saldr dzenleme zaman. Kumandan, grevin Southgate ehri ve evresini koruma altna almak ve zgrletirmek!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_DESC.id: Dengan terobosan kita, kini waktunya untuk menyerang di jantung kawasan ini. Komandan, misimu adalah untuk mengamankan kota Southgate dan sekelilingnya!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_DESC.ms: Dengan penerobosan kita, ini masa untuk menyerang bahagian tengah. Komander, misi anda untuk menawan dan membebaskan bandar Southgate dan sekelilingnya!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_OBJECTIVE_1.de: Stell den Bau des Hauptquartiers fertig

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_OBJECTIVE_4.it: Distruggi il bunker del comando nemico
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_OBJECTIVE_4.es: Destruye el bnker de mando del enemigo
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_OBJECTIVE_4.pt: Destri a Casamata de Comando do Inimigo

CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.en: Don't get too comfortable there. My troops will soon drive you straight into the sea!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.de: Mach es dir dort nicht zu bequem. Bald schon werden meine Truppen dich ins Meer befrdern.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.fr: N'allez pas vous faire des ides. Mes troupes vous repousseront bientt  la mer !
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.it: Non rilassarti troppo qui. Le mie truppe presto ti porteranno direttamente a mare!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.es: No te creas que esto va a ser un paseo por el campo, porque mis tropas te van a enviar al fondo del ocano en un santiamn.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.pt: No te sintas demasiado confortvel. Em breve as minhas tropas iro fazer-te recuar at ao mar!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.tr: Orada ok rahatlama. Birliklerim yaknda seni denize dkecek!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.id: Jangan pikir kau bisa enak-enak di sana. Pasukanku tak lama lagi akan membuangmu ke laut!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.ms: Jangan selesa sangat. Askar saya akan menghalau anda sampai ke laut!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.en: Is this real life? This can't be happening! You just wait until my cousin hears about this!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.de: Geschieht das wirklich? Das kann nicht sein! Warte nur, bis mein Cousin davon erfhrt!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.fr: Vous rigolez ? C'est impossible ! Attendez que mon cousin ait vent de a !
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.it: Ma  reale? Non pu accadere! Aspetta solo che mio cugino lo venga a sapere!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.es: De veras esto no es una pesadilla? No puede ser verdad! Esprate a que mi primo se entere de esto...
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.pt: Isto  a vida real? Isto no pode estar a acontecer! Espera s at o meu primo saber disto!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.tr: Bu gerek hayat m? Bu olamaz! Kuzenim duysun da gr!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.id: Ini tidak mungkin terjadi! Tunggu saja sampai sepupuku mendengar tentang hal ini!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.ms: Ini benar ke? Tak mungkin! Tunggu sampai sepupu saya dengar tentang ni!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.en: Aargh! What is this!? Troops... troops! Help!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.de: Verdammt! Wo kommen die denn her!? Truppen ... Truppen! Hilfe!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.it: Aargh! Di cosa si tratta!? Truppe... truppe! Aiuto!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.es: Aaaarg! Qu es esto? Tropas! Tropas! Ayuda!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.pt: Argh! O que  isto?! Tropas... tropas! Socorro!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.tr: Aaah! Bu da ne!? Birlikler... birlikler! mdat!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.id: Aaaaah! Apa ini!? Pasukan... pasukan! Tolong!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.en: You are starting to get on my nerves, vermin! Turn back now and I may let you live.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.de: Ungeziefer, du gehst mir auf die Nerven! Wenn du jetzt umkehrst, lasse ich dich vielleicht leben.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.fr: a commence  bien faire, les parasites ! Partez et je vous laisserai peut-tre la vie sauve.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.it: Mi stai veramente facendo arrabbiare, parassita! Vattene ora e forse ti lascer vivere.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.es: Ests empezando a sacarme de quicio, pequea alimaa! Date la vuelta ahora y te dejar vivir!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.pt: Ests a comear a irritar-me, insecto! Volta para trs agora e talvez te deixe viver.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.tr: te imdi damarma bastn bcek! imdi geri ekilirsen yaamana izin verebilirim.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.id: Kau membuat kesabaranku habis,  cecunguk! Mundur sekarang juga dan kubiarkan kau tetap hidup.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.ms: Ini membuatkan saya betul-betul marah! Berundur sekarang dan saya akan biarkan anda hidup.

CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_1.en: Outstanding work, soldier! You've done your country proud!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_1.de: Herausragende Arbeit, Soldat! Sie haben Ihr Land mit Stolz erfllt!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_1.fr: Excellent, soldat ! Ton pays est fier de toi !
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_1.it: Lavoro eccezionale, soldato! Il tuo paese  orgoglioso!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_1.es: Magnfico trabajo! Eres la honra de este pas.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_1.pt: Excelente trabalho, soldado! Encheste o teu pas de orgulho!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_1.id: Kerja yang luar biasa prajurit! Kau membuat negaramu bangga!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_1.ms: Kerja yang cemerlang,skot! Anda kebanggaan negara!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_2.en: I... (sniffle) ...I can't believe this! Please don't tell my superiors that I cried.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_2.de: Ich ... (schnief) ... Ich fasse es nicht! Erwhn bitte gegenber meinen Vorgesetzten nicht, dass ich geweint habe.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_2.fr: Je... (snif)... n'y crois pas ! Ne dis pas  mes suprieurs que j'ai pleur.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_2.it: Io... (sniff) ...io non ci credo! Ti prego, non dire ai miei superiori che ho pianto.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_2.es: Yo... Snifs, snifs. No me lo puedo creer! No le digas a mis superiores que he llorado.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_2.pt: No... (sniff) ... No acredito nisto! No digas aos meus superiores que chorei.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_2.tr: Ben... buna inanamyorum! Ltfen amirlerime aladm syleme.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_2.id: Aku... (terisak) ...Aku tidak percaya ini terjadi! Jangan bilang atasanku aku menangis.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_2.ms: Saya.saya tak boleh percaya! Jangan beritahu ketua saya yang saya menangis.

CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_3.en: Tubman, get a grip of yourself and counter-attack! And I'll be seeing you soon, Commander...
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_3.de: Tubman, rei dich am Riemen und geh zum Gegenangriff ber! Sie sehe ich bald schon wieder, Kommandant ...
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_3.fr: Tubman, reprenez-vous et attaquez ! Nous nous reverrons bientt, Commandant...
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_3.it: Tubman, controllati e contrattacca! Ci vedremo presto, comandante...
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_3.es: Tubman, comprtate y contraataca de una vez. A ti te ver dentro de poco, comandante...
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_3.pt: Tubman, no sejas lamechas e contra-ataca! E ns encontramo-nos brevemente, Comandante...
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_3.tr: Tubman, dizginleri eline al ve bir kar saldr dzenle! Ve seninle de yaknda greceiz Kumandan...
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_3.id: Tubman, kuasai dirimu dan lakukan serangan balasan! Dan kita akan segera bertemu Komandan...
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_3.ms: Tubman, bertenanglah dan seranglah balas! Dan saya akan jumpa anda nanti, Komander

CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_4.en: Your time will come soon Viceroy Vile, and you'll pay for what you did to our country!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_4.de: Deine Zeit wird bald kommen, Viceroy Vile. Und dann wirst du fr all das zahlen, was du unserem Land angetan hast!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_4.fr: Ton heure approche, Viceroy Vile, et tu devras payer pour ce que tu as fait !
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_4.it: La tua ora arriver presto Viceroy Vile e pagherai fino all'ultimo centesimo il male che hai fatto al nostro paese!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_4.es: Dentro de poco te llegar el turno a ti, Viceroy Vile, y pagars por lo que has hecho sufrir a nuestro pueblo.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_4.pt: O teu fim est prximo, Vice-rei Vile, e pagars pelo que fizeste ao nosso pas!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_4.tr: Senin de sran gelecek Viceroy Vile, ve lkemize yaptn deyeceksin!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_4.id: Waktumu akan segera tiba Viceroy Vile, dan kau akan membayar semua yang telah kau lakukan pada negara kami!
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_4.ms: Masa anda akan tiba, Wizurai Vile, dan anda akan membayar kepada apa yang anda lakukan pada negara kami!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_5.en: Go play with the rest of your sheep, Bragg. I've got better things to do than banter with you.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_5.de: Spiel doch mit dem Rest deiner Schfchen, Bragg. Ich habe wichtigeres zu tun, als mit dir herumzuscherzen.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_5.fr: Va jouer avec tes moutons, Bragg. J'ai mieux  faire que de rester l avec toi.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_5.it: Vai a giocare con le altre pecore, Bragg. Ho di meglio da fare che scherzare con te.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_5.es: Ve a jugar con el resto de tus ovejas, Bragg. Yo tengo mejores cosas que hacer que bromear contigo.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_5.pt: Vai brincar com o resto das tuas ovelhas, Bragg. Tenho mais que fazer do que andar  bulha contigo.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_5.tr: Git de koyunlarnn kalanyla oyna Bragg. Seninle dalga gemekle uraamam, yapacak daha iyi ilerim var.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_5.id: Pergilah kau dengan pasukan bodohmu itu Bragg. Aku punya kegiatan lain yang lebih penting daripada bercanda denganmu.
CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_5.ms: Pergilah main dengan biri-biri anda yang lain Bragg. Saya ada perkara yang lebih penting untuk dibuat daripada bertekak dengan anda.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_INTRO.en: Fresh lambs for the slaughter, I see! I will break you like a twig! BWAHAHA!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_INTRO.de: Ah, neue Lmmer, die geschlachtet werden wollen! Dich breche ich wie einen Zweig! BUAHAHA!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_INTRO.fr: Des agneaux tout frais, superbe ! Je vais vous briser ! BWAHAHA !
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_INTRO.it: Agnelli freschi per il massacro, bene! Ti spezzer come un ramoscello! BWAHAHA!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_INTRO.es: Corderos listos para ser degollados, eh? Os aplastar como a una mosca! JA, JA, JA!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_INTRO.pt: Vejo que trazes mais ovelhas para a matana! Vou partir-te como um ramo! BWAHAHA!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_INTRO.tr: Gryorum ki kesecek taze kuzular var! Seni bir dal gibi kracam! HAHAHAH!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_INTRO.id: Wah ada darah segar yang siap dihirup rupanya! Akan kusikat habis semuanya! HAHAHA!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_INTRO.ms: Biri-biri untuk disembelih, ya! Saya akan patahkan kamu seperti ranting kayu! BWAHAHA!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_DESC.en: He may be insane, but Chief McDuff is still a clever tactician and a ruthless soldier. Your mission is to free Westbay from his maniacal grasp at any cost!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_DESC.de: Er mag verrckt sein, aber Chief McDuff ist und bleibt ein gewiefter Taktiker und unbarmherziger Soldat. Es ist dein Auftrag, Westbucht aus seinen wahnsinnigen Fngen zu befreien!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_DESC.fr: Il est peut-tre fou, mais le Chef McDuff reste un tacticien rus et un soldat implacable. Libre Westbay de son joug  tout prix !
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_DESC.it: Forse sar pazzo, ma il capitano McDuff  pur sempre un astuto tattico e un soldato spietato. La tua missione  liberare Westbay dal suo dominio maniacale a ogni costo!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_DESC.es: Puede que est como una regadera, pero el general McDuff sigue siendo un buen estratega y un soldado despiadado. Tu misin consiste en liberar Baha Oeste de su demente yugo, sea como sea.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_DESC.pt: Ele pode ser louco, mas o Chefe McDuff no deixa de ser um estratega inteligente e um soldado impiedoso. A tua misso  libertar Westbay das suas garras malficas a qualquer preo!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_DESC.tr: Deli olabilir ama ef McDuff hala zeki bir taktisyen ve acmasz bir asker. Grevin, ne pahasna olursa olsun Westbay' onun manyak kontrolnden kurtarmak!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_DESC.id: Mungkin ia gila, tapi Chief McDuff adalah ahli siasat yang ulung dan prajurit yang bengis. Misimu adalah membebaskan Westbay dari cengkeraman sintingnya dengan segala cara!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_DESC.ms: Dia mungkin gila, tapi Cif McDuff masih seorang ahli taktik yang pandai dan tentera yang kejam. Misi kamu ialah membebaskan Westbay dari cengkaman dia tak kira apapun!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_4.en: Destroy the Enemy Secret Police HQ
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_4.de: Zerstr das Hauptquartier der Feindlichen Geheimpolizei
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_4.fr: Dtruis le QG de la police secrte
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_4.it: Distruggi il QG della polizia segreta nemica
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_4.es: Destruye el cuartel general de la polica secreta
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_4.pt: Destri o QG da Polcia Secreta Inimiga
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_4.tr: Dman Gizli Polis Karargahn imha et

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.en: Bah, land means nothing to me! Our Benevolent Comrade Vile has more!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.de: Land bedeutet mir berhaupt nichts! Unser Gtiger Genosse Vile besitzt mehr!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.fr: Pff, la terre n'est rien ! Notre Bienveillant Camarade Vile va vous montrer !
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.it: Bah, la terra non significa nulla per me! I nostro benevolo compagno Vile ne ha tanta!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.es: Bah, las tierras no me importan. Nuestro querido amigo Vile tiene de sobra!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.pt: Bah, a terra no tem qualquer interesse para mim! O nosso Benvolo Camarada Vile tem mais!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.tr: Peh, toprak bana bir ey ifade etmiyor! Cmert Yoldamz Vile daha fazlasna sahip!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.id: Huh, aku tidak butuh tanah! Kamerad Vile yang Baik Hati masih punya lebih banyak!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.ms: Ceh, tanah tak penting bagiku. Wizurai ada banyak lagi!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.en: You think you've hurt me? Don't make me laugh! BWAHAHA!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.de: Das soll mich getroffen haben? Bring mich nicht zum Lachen! BUAHAHA!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.fr: Tu crois avoir gagn ? Ne me fais pas rire ! BWAHAHA !
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.it: Pensi di avermi ferito? Non farmi ridere! BWAHAHA!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.es: Acaso crees que me has herido? No me hagas rer! JA, JA, JA!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.pt: Achas que me feriste? No me faas rir! BWAHAHA!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.tr: Bana zarar verdiini mi sanyorsun? Beni gldrme! AHAHAH!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.id: Kau pikir kau telah menyakitiku? Jangan bikin aku tertawa! HAHAHA!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.ms: Kau ingat kau dah sakiti aku? Jangan buat lawak! BWAHAHA!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.en: Have your little city back! I want to see them cry while I destroy you!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.de: Deine kleine Stadt kannst du zurckhaben! Ich will sie weinen sehen, wenn ich dich zerstre!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.fr: Reprends ta petite ville ! Je veux les voir pleurer quand je te dtruirai !
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.it: Riprenditi la tua piccola citt! Voglio vederli piangere mentre ti distruggo!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.es: Qudate con tu horrible ciudad si te apetece! Quiero que lloren mientras ven cmo te destrozo.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.pt: Fica l com a tua cidadezinha! Quero v-los chorar enquanto te destruo!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.tr: Al kk ehrin senin olsun! Seni yok ederken aladklarn grmek istiyorum!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.id: Ambillah kembali kota kecilmu! Aku ingin melihat mereka menangis saat kumusnahkan dirimu!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.ms: Ambillah pekan kecil kau tu! Aku mahu mereka menangis sementara aku musnahkan kau!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.en: You think you have won!? Your day will come soon and it ain't gonna be about tweetie birds and sunshine!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.de: Du glaubst, du hast gewonnen!? Dein Tag wird noch frh genug kommen. Allerdings ohne Vogelgezwitscher und Sonnenschein!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.fr: Tu penses avoir vaincu !? Ton jour approche, sans tambour ni trompette !
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.it: Pensi di aver vinto!? Il tuo giorno arriver presto e non ci saranno il sole e gli uccellini!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.es: De veras crees que has ganado? Tu da llegar dentro de poco, y no habr pajaritos y flores precisamente.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.pt: Achas que ganhaste?! O teu dia est para breve e no ser um dia de sol radioso e cheio de passarinhos!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.tr: Kazandn m sanyorsun? Yaknda senin de sran gelecek ve hi de yle cvl cvl gneli bir gn olmayacak!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.id: Kamu pikir kau telah menang!? Hari akhirmu segera tiba dan hari itu pasti bukan hari yang cerah!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.ms: Ingat kau dah menang?! Hari kau akan tiba dan ia takkan indah seperti hari ini!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_1.en: Take that, you criminal! Justice prevails in Westbay!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_1.de: Nimm das, du Verbrecher! In Westbay obsiegt die Gerechtigkeit!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_1.fr: Prends a, sclrat ! La justice s'impose enfin  Westbay !
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_1.it: Ecco a te, criminale! La giustizia vince a Westbay!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_1.es: Chpate esa, criminal! La justicia prevalece en Baha Oeste.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_1.pt: Ora toma, criminoso! A justia prevalece em Westbay!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_1.tr: Al bakalm seni katil! Westbay'da adalet hkm sryor!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_1.id: Rasakan itu kau penjahat! Akhirnya keadilan juga yang menang di Westbay!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_1.ms: Ambil ni, si jahat! Keadilan ditegakkan di Westbay!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_2.en: Come over here and say that, Bragg!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_2.de: Sag mir das ins Gesicht, Bragg!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_2.es: Atrvete a venir y decir eso, Bragg!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_2.tr: Buraya gel ve syle bakalm Bragg!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_2.id: Kemarilah kau dan katakan itu Bragg!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_2.ms: Datanglah sini dan kata begitu, Bragg!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_3.en: McDuff, go regroup and stop embarrassing yourself. As for you, Bragg, I won't underestimate your little hero next time. That is all.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_3.de: McDuff, formier dich neu, und hr auf, dich zum Affen zu machen. Was dich angeht, Bragg, werde ich deinen kleinen Helden das nchste Mal nicht unterschtzen. Das war's.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_3.fr: McDuff, regroupez vos troupes et arrtez a. Quant  vous, Bragg, je ne sous-estimerai plus votre petit hros. Termin.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_3.it: McDuff, vai a raggruppare le truppe e smettila di imbarazzarti. Per quanto riguarda te, Bragg, non sottovaluterei il tuo piccolo eroe la prossima volta. Questo  quanto.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_3.es: McDuff, ve a reorganizar tus tropas y deja de hacer el ridculo. Respecto a ti, Bragg... La prxima vez no subestimar a tu pequeo hroe. Adis.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_3.pt: McDuff, reagrupa e pra de ser um embarao. Quanto a ti, Bragg, da prxima vez no subestimarei o nosso pequeno heri.  s isso.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_3.tr: McDuff, yeniden birle ve kendini utandrmaktan vazge. Sana gelince Bragg, kk kahramann bir dahakine hafife almayacam. imdilik bu kadar.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_3.id: McDuff, susun kembali kekuatanmu dan berhenti mempermalukan dirimu. Dan untukmu Bragg, Aku tidak akan menyepelekan lagi pahlawan kecilmu. Itu saja.
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_3.ms: McDuff, pergi berkumpul semula dan jangan malukan diri sendiri. Anda pula, Bragg, saya takkan pandang rendah orang bawahan anda lagi. Itu saja.

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_4.en: We've got you on the run, Vile! I can't wait to get my hands on you!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_4.de: Wir scheuchen dich vor uns her, Vile! Ich kann es kaum erwarten, dich in die Finger zu bekommen!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_4.fr: Cours, cours, Vile ! On te mettra bientt la main \ndessus !
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_4.it: Ti abbiamo messo in fuga, Vile! Non vedo l'ora di metterti le mani addosso!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_4.es: Tan solo sabes huir, Vile! Qu ganas tengo de ponerte las manos encima...
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_4.pt: Continua a fugir, Vile! Mal posso esperar para te pr as mos em cima!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_4.tr: Seni kaarken yakaladk Vile! Seni elime geireceim an sabrszlkla bekliyorum!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_4.id: Kami telah berhasil memuatmu terbirit-birit Vile! Tak sabar rasanya ingin memberimu pelajaran!
CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_4.ms: Kami sedang menghalau anda, Vile! Tak sabar rasanya nak tangkap anda nanti!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO.en: You're here already? I wish Viceroy Vile would have sent one more division, but this'll have to do.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO.de: Du bist bereits hier? Ich wnschte mir, Viceroy Vile htte noch eine Division mehr geschickt, aber es muss auch ohne gehen.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO.fr: Dj l ? J'aurais aim que le Viceroy m'envoie une division supplmentaire, mais on se dbrouillera.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO.it: Sei gi qui? Vorrei che Viceroy Vile avesse mandato ancor un'altra divisione, ma dovremmo farci bastare questo.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO.es: Ya ests aqu? Ojal Viceroy Vile hubiera enviado ms tropas, pero tendremos que conformarnos.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO.pt: J chegaste? Quem me dera que o Vice-rei Vile me mandasse mais uma diviso, mas isto ter de chegar.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO.tr: Ne abuk geldin? Keke Viceroy Vile fazladan bir blk daha gnderseydi, ama bu da i grr.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO.id: Kau sudah tiba di sini? Aku berharap Viceroy Vile mengirim satu divisi lagi, namun ini sudah cukup.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO.ms: Anda dah sampai sini? Ingatkan Wizurai Vile akan hantar lagi satu divisi, tapi ini pun cukup.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO2.en: Thank you for going to the aid of our eastern lands. The citizens must be liberated and given their old lives back!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO2.de: Danke, dass du unseren stlichen Landen hilfst. Die Brger mssen befreit werden und ihr altes Leben zurckbekommen!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO2.fr: Merci d'aider nos concitoyens. Il faut les librer et leur rendre leur vie d'avant !
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO2.it: Grazie per essere accorso in aiuto delle terre orientali. I cittadini devono essere liberati e ritornare alle loro vite!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO2.es: Gracias por acudir en ayuda de las tierras orientales. Los ciudadanos han de ser liberados y deben recuperar sus vidas.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO2.pt: Obrigado por ajudares a nossa regio Oriental. Os cidados devem ser libertos e recuperar as suas vidas anteriores!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO2.tr: Dou topraklarna yardma gittiin iin teekkrler. Vatandalar zgrletirilmeli ve eski yaamlar onlara geri verilmeli!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO2.id: Terima kasih atas bantuanmu di wilayah timur. Warga harus dimerdekakan dan menikmati kehidupan mereka seperti sedia kala!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO2.ms: Terima kasih kerana menolong daerah timur kami. Penduduk mesti dibebaskan dan diberi kehidupan seperti sediakala.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_DESC.en: The Eastern Coast is occupied by troops under Colonel Stark. He's a brilliant and experienced soldier, so find his weakness and hit him hard before he can retaliate!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_DESC.de: Die Eastern Coast wird von Oberst Starks Truppen besetzt. Er ist ein brillanter und erfahrener Soldat. Finde seinen Schwachpunkt und triff ihn schwer, bevor er zurckschlagen kann.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_DESC.fr: La cte Est est occupe par les troupes du Colonel Stark. C'est un soldat brillant et expriment, trouve son point faible et frappe-le avant qu'il ne puisse riposter !
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_DESC.it: La costa orientale  occupata dalle truppe del colonnello Stark.  un soldato estremamente intelligente ed esperto perci trova il suo punto debole e colpisci duramente prima che possa contrattaccare!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_DESC.es: La Costa Este est ocupada por tropas del coronel Stark. Es un soldado brillante y cuenta con mucha experiencia, as que ser mejor que encuentres su punto dbil y ataques sin piedad antes de que pueda contraatacar.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_DESC.pt: A Costa Oriental est ocupada por tropas sob as ordens do Coronel Stark. Ele  um soldado brilhante e experiente, pelo que deves descobrir a sua fraqueza e atac-lo em fora antes que possa retaliar!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_DESC.tr: Dou Kys, Albay Stark emrindeki birlikler tarafndan igal edildi. Zeki ve deneyimli bir asker, o yzden zayfln bul ve misilleme yapmadan nce byk hasar ver!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_DESC.id: Pantai Timur dikuasai oleh pasukan di bawah Kolonel Stark. Ia adalah prajurit yang brilian dan berpengalaman, jadi temukan kelemahannya dan berikan perlawanan sengit sebelum ia dapat membalas!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_DESC.ms: Eastern Coast dihuni oleh askar di bawah Kolonel Stark. Dia bijak dan berpengalaman, jadi cari kelemahannya dan serang dengan padu sebelum dia menyerang balas!

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.en: Well played. That was not the move I expected from you.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.de: Gut gespielt. Den Zug habe ich von dir nicht erwartet.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.fr: Bien jou. Je ne m'y attendais pas du tout.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.it: Ben fatto. Non era la mossa che mi aspettavo da te.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.es: Bien jugado... No me esperaba una jugada como esa de ti.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.pt: Bem jogado. No era a atitude que esperava de ti.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.tr: yi oynadn. Senden beklediim hamle deildi.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.id: Langkah yang taktis. Bukan gerakan yang aku harapkan darimu.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.ms: Bagus. Saya tak menjangka ini dari anda.

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.en: If I had been given more units, this may have turned out differently...
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.de: Htte ich mehr Einheiten gehabt, wre das Ergebnis ein anderes gewesen ...
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.fr: Avec plus d'units, les choses auraient t diffrentes...
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.it: Se avessi avuto pi unit, le cose sarebbero potute andare diversamente...
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.es: Si hubiera contado con ms unidades, otro gallo habra cantado...
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.pt: Se eu tivesse mais unidades, isto poderia ter acabado de maneira diferente...
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.tr: Eer daha fazla nitem olsayd, bu iin sonu bambaka bitebilirdi...
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.id: Jika saja aku punya regu lebih banyak, hasilnya mungkin berbeda...
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.ms: Kalau ada lebih banyak unit diberi, mungkin lain jadinya

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.en: You have taken the city, forcing me into a strategic retreat. However, don't think you've won yet!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.de: Du hast die Stadt erobert und mich zu einem strategischen Rckzug gezwungen. Glaub aber nicht, dass du bereits gewonnen hast!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.fr: Tu as pris la ville, je me retire. Mais ne va pas t'imaginer que nous allons nous reposer l !
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.it: Hai preso la citt, obbligandomi a una ritirata strategica. Tuttavia, non credo che sia detta l'ultima parola!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.es: Te has hecho con la ciudad y me has obligado a que me retire por ahora. Pero an no has ganado!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.pt: Conquistaste a cidade, obrigando-me a fazer uma retirada estratgica. No entanto, no penses que ganhaste!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.tr: Beni stratejik bir geri ekilmeye zorlayarak ehri aldn. Ama henz kazandn sanma!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.id: Kau telah menduduki kota, memaksa aku melakukan langkah mundur strategis. Namun demikian, jangan kira kau telah menang!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.ms: Anda sudah menawan bandar, memaksa saya berundur. Tapi jangan fikir anda dah menang!

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.en: Checkmate. You have bested me fairly. I concede.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.de: Schachmatt. Du hast mich im fairen Kampf geschlagen, das gebe ich zu.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.fr: chec et mat. Je suis battu  la rgulire. Je le reconnais.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.it: Scacco matto. Mi hai letteralmente stracciato. Devo ammetterlo.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.es: Jaque mate. He de reconocer que me has ganado con todas las de la ley.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.pt: Cheque-mate. Foi uma vitria justa. Admito.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.tr: ah mat. Beni adil bir ekilde yenilgiye urattn. tiraf ediyorum.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.id: Skak mat. Kau telah mengalahkanku. Aku menyerah.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.ms: Checkmate. Anda kalahkan saya dengan adil. Saya terima.

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_1.en: Your troops were well deployed, with adequate resources and leadership. I commend you.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_1.de: Deine Truppen waren gut aufgestellt, verfgten ber ausreichend Ressourcen und wurden effektiv befehligt. Ich muss dich loben.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_1.fr: Tu as bien dploy tes troupes, avec assez de ressources et un bon commandement. Bravo.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_1.it: Le tue truppe erano schierate perfettamente e avevano le risorse e la guida giusta. Complimenti.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_1.es: Has posicionado muy bien a tus tropas, y contabas con buenos recursos y grandes dotes de liderazgo. Te doy la enhorabuena.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_1.pt: As tuas tropas foram bem distribudas, com recursos e liderana adequados. Tiro-te o chapu.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_1.tr: Birliklerin, yeterli kaynak ve liderlikle, iyi konulanm durumda. Sayglarm sunuyorum.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_1.id: Kau telah menerjunkan pasukan  dengan baik, serta memiliki perbekalan dan kepemimpinan yang memadai. Aku salut padamu.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_1.ms: Askar anda  mengikut rancangan, dengan bekalan yang cukup dan kepimpinan. Saya puji anda.

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_2.en: You put up a good fight, Stark, but it's time to step aside.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_2.de: Du hast dich wacker geschlagen, Stark, aber nun musst du Platz machen.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_2.fr: Belle bataille, Stark, mais il est temps de nous laisser passer.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_2.it: Hai combattuto bene Stark, ma  ora che tu ti faccia da parte.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_2.es: Has sido un buen contrincante, Stark, pero es hora de que te apartes a un lado.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_2.pt: Combateste bem, Stark, mas  altura de te afastares.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_2.tr: yi bir arpma ortaya koydun Stark, ama artk ekilme zaman.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_2.id: Kau melawan dengan sengit Stark, namun sekarang waktunya kau mundur.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_2.ms: Ini perlawanan yang baik Stark, tapi masa untuk ke tepi

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_3.de: Platz mache ich in der Tat ...

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_6.en: There's nothing to betray when one has always worn blue underneath, my dear "Benevolent Comrade". Besides, there are true traitors amongst you!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_6.de: Wen soll ich verraten haben, wenn ich doch immer blau darunter trug, mein lieber "Gtiger Genosse". Auerdem gibt es in euren Reihen wahre Verrter!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_6.fr: Il ne peut tre question de trahison, jamais je n'ai t de ton ct, mon cher "Bienveillant Camarade". Par contre, il y a de vritables tratres  tes cts.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_6.it: Non  tradimento se ho sempre indossato il blu sotto, mio caro "benevolo camerata". Inoltre, ci sono davvero dei traditori tra i tuoi uomini!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_6.es: Para nada se considera a alguien traidor, sobre todo si siempre ha vestido de azul en su interior, querido "comandante benvolo". Adems, entre tus filas hay verdaderos traidores.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_6.pt: No h nada para trair para quem sempre vestiu a cor azul, meu caro "Benvolo Camarada". Alm disso, tens verdadeiros traidores entre os teus escales.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_6.tr: Eh, zamannda bakalarna ihanet ederek senin tarafna gemitim benim sevgili Cmert Yoldam. Ayrca, aranzda gerek hainler var!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_6.id: Tidak ada yang dikhianati jika di darahku mengalir pasukan biru sejati, "Kamerad yang Baik Hati". Lagipula, pengkhianat yang sebenarnya ada di pihakmu!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_6.ms: Tiada apa yang dibelot apabila seseorang memang dah lama memakai 'biru' di bawah, Wizurai. Lagipun ada lagi pembelot sebenar di kalangan anda!

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_7.de: DAS WIRST DU NOCH BEREUEN! VEERDAAMMMT!!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_7.es: ME LAS VAS A PAGAR, AAAAARG!
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_7.id: KAU AKAN MENYESALI HAL INI! ARRGGGGHH!!

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_8.en: Plots within plots eh, Colonel Stark? Good to have you on our side! Please report for a full debriefing on enemy Intel.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_8.de: Komplotte innerhalb der Komplotte. Was meinen Sie, Oberst Stark? Gut, Sie auf unsere Seite zu haben! Melden Sie sich zu einer Nachbesprechung zu feindlichen Berichten.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_8.fr: Des complots dans le complot, Colonel Stark ? Content de vous avoir avec nous ! Briefing sur les positions ennemies.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_8.it: Un complotto nel complotto eh, colonnello Stark?  bello saperti dalla nostra parte! Ti prego di andare a rapporto per una lunga chiacchierata sui segreti del nemico.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_8.es: Subtramas dentro de la trama principal, eh, coronel Stark? Me alegro de estar de tu parte. Manda un informe completo acerca de la informacin sobre el enemigo.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_8.pt: Tramas dentro de tramas, no  Coronel Stark? Ainda bem que ests do nosso lado! Espero o teu relatrio completo sobre o Inimigo.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_8.tr: Komplo iinde komplo ha Albay Stark? Seni bizim tarafmzda grmek gzel! Ltfen dman stihbarat zerine tam bir bilgilendirme raporu ver.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_8.id: Intrik di dalam intrik Kolonel Stark? Senang bisa melihatmu berada di pihak kita! Tolong berikan laporan lengkap tentang Informasi musuh.
CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_8.ms: Plot dalam plot ke, Stark? Bagus anda dapat sertai kami! Sila laporkan untuk taklimat risikan.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_INTRO.en: Are you ready to die!? I won't go easy on you this time!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_INTRO.de: Bist du bereit, zu sterben!? Diesmal schone ich dich nicht!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_INTRO.fr: Prt  mourir !? Je ne retiendrai pas mes coups cette fois !
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_INTRO.it: Sei pronto a morire!? Questa volta ci andr gi pesante con te!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_INTRO.es: Ests listo para morir? Esta vez no mostrar piedad.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_INTRO.pt: Est pronto para morrer?! Desta vez talvez no serei to misericordioso!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_INTRO.tr: lmeye hazr msn!? Bu sefer kyak gemeyeceim!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_INTRO.id: Kau siap mati!? Aku tidak akan membuatmu melenggang kangkung kali ini!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_INTRO.ms: Sedia untuk mati?! Aku takkan beri peluang kali ini!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_DESC.en: Chief McDuff has built up defenses around the city of Westford. Let's take him down for good this time!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_DESC.de: Chief McDuff hat rund um die Stadt Westford Verteidigungen errichtet. Lass ihn uns diesesmal endgltig erledigen!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_DESC.fr: Le Chef McDuff a rig des lignes dfensives autour de Westford. On se le fait !
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_DESC.it: Il capitano McDuff ha costruito strutture difensive intorno alla citt di Westford. Eliminiamole per sempre questa volta!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_DESC.es: El general McDuff ha construido defensas alrededor de la ciudad de Vadoccidental. Vamos a encargarnos de l de una vez por todas.
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_DESC.pt: O Chefe McDuff construir defesas em volta da cidade de Westford. Vamos acabar com ele de uma vez!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_DESC.tr: ef McDuff, Westford ehri etrafnda savunma ina etti. Bu sefer temelli olarak iini bitirelim!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_DESC.id: Chief McDuff telah membangun pertahanan di sekeliling kota Westford. Ayo buat dia tidak berkutik kali ini!
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_DESC.ms: Cif McDuff membina pertahanan keliling bandar Westford. Kita kalahkan dia terus kali ini!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_OBJECTIVE_5.fr: Dtruis la forteresse de combat ennemie
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_OBJECTIVE_5.it: Distruggi la grande fortezza del nemico
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_OBJECTIVE_5.es: Destruye la fortaleza de batalla enemiga
MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_OBJECTIVE_5.pt: Destri a Fortaleza de Combate Inimiga

CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.en: Come on and fight me, you coward!!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.de: Stell dich zum Kampf, du Feigling!!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.tr: Gel ve benimle dv korkak herif!!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.en: I've got plenty more where those came from! I'll do whatever it takes to make you bleed!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.de: Von denen habe ich noch viele mehr! Du wirst bluten, egal, was es mich kostet!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.fr: J'en ai encore plein d'autres ! Je vais te saigner, tu vas voir !
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.it: Ho ancora un mare di truppe nel posto da cui provengono! Far tutto ci che serve per farti sputare sangue!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.es: Tengo muchos ms esperando mis rdenes! Har lo que sea para doblegarte.
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.pt: Tenho muitos mais de onde esses vieram! Farei tudo ao meu alcance para te fazer sangrar!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.tr: Bunlarn geldii yerde daha ok var! Sana zarar vermek iin ne gerekiyorsa yapacam!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.id: Masih banyak seperti itu di tempat asalku! Akan kulakukan segala cara untuk membuatmu sengsara!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.ms: Aku ada lagi banyak muslihat! Aku akan buat apa saja untuk menyeksa kau!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.en: Stop moving around, you little thief!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.de: Bleib endlich stehen, du kleiner Dieb!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.fr: Arrte de bouger comme a, voleur !
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.it: Smettila andare in giro, piccolo ladro!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.es: Deja de moverte de un lado para otro, rata!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.pt: Pra de andar de um lado para o outro, seu ladro!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.ms: Jangan lari ke sana ke mari, pencuri hingus!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.en: Those pesky civilians are nothing but trouble. Vile should have let me handle them as I planned!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.de: Diese lstigen Zivilisten machen nur rger! Vile htte mich so mit ihnen verfahren lassen sollen, wich es geplant hatte!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.fr: Ces civils ne sont qu'une nuisance. Vile aurait d me laisser m'en occuper comme prvu !
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.it: Quei fastidiosi civili sono solo un problema. Vile avrebbe dovuto farmene occupare come avevo pianificato!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.es: Esos malditos civiles no son nada ms que un estorbo. Vile me tendra que haber dejado actuar como quera.
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.pt: Aqueles civis irritantes s do trabalho. O Vile devia ter-me deixado lidar com eles como eu queria!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.tr: Bu rahatsz edici siviller beladan baka bir ey deil. Vile, planladm gibi idare etmeme izin vermeli!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.id: Rakyat sipil pembawa sial itu benar-benar bikin susah. Vile seharusnya membiarkan aku yang bertindak seperti rencanaku!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.ms: Orang awam ini memang menyusahkan. Vile sepatutnya biarkan aku menyelesaikan mereka seperti dirancang!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_5.en: You insolent little punk! You will pay for this!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_5.de: Du unverschmter kleiner Dreckskerl! Dafr wirst du bezahlen!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_5.fr: Sale petit insolent ! Tu vas me le payer !
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_5.it: Tu, piccolo bastardo insolente! Pagherai per questo!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_5.es: Sers insolente! Me las vas a pagar!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_5.pt: Seu mido irritante! Vais pagar por isto!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_5.id: Kepinding kecil kurang ajar! Kau akan mendapatkan balasannya!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_5.ms: Budak hingus! Kamu akan dibalas nanti!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_1.en: You think that you have gained anything? These lands have nothing!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_1.de: Glaubst du tatschlich, etwas gewonnen zu haben? Diese Lnder sind wertlos!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_1.fr: N'imagines pas avoir gagn quoi que ce soit ! Ces terres ne valent rien !
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_1.it: Pensi di averci guadagnato qualcosa? Queste terre non hanno nulla!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_1.es: Acaso crees que has ganado algo? Estas tierras no valen un pimiento!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_1.pt: Achas que ganhaste alguma coisa?! Estas terras esto vazias!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_1.tr: Bir ey elde ettiini mi sanyorsun? Bu topraklarda hibir ey yok!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_1.id: Kau pikir telah mendapatkan sesuatu yang berharga? Tanah ini tidak ada apa-apanya!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_1.ms: Kau ingat kau dah dapat sesuatu? Tanah ini tiada nilai!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_2.en: We fight for the people, McDuff. That's what will always separate us from criminals like you!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_2.de: Wir kmpfen fr die Menschen, McDuff. Das unterscheidet uns von Verbrechern wie dir!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_2.fr: Nous luttons pour le peuple, McDuff. C'est ce qui nous diffrencie de criminels dans ton genre !
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_2.it: Noi combattiamo per le persone, McDuff. Ecco cosa ci distinguer per sempre dai criminali come te!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_2.es: Luchamos por la gente, McDuff. Eso es lo que nos diferencia a nosotros de criminales como t!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_2.pt: Ns lutamos pelo povo, McDuff.  isso que nos separa de criminosos como tu!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_2.tr: Biz halk iin savayoruz McDuff. te bizi senin gibi katillerden her zaman ayracak ey de bu!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_2.id: Kami bertempur demi rakyat, McDuff. Itulah yang selalu membedakan kami dari penjahat busuk seperti kau!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_2.ms: Kami berperang demi rakyat, McDuff. Inilah yang membezakan kami dengan penjenayah seperti kamu!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_3.en: Do your precious people appreciate how your invasion has destroyed their lands? Who's the enemy here? BWAHAHA!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_3.de: Freuen sich denn eure wertvollen Menschen darber, dass euer Einmarsch ihr Land zerstrt hat? Wer ist hier der Feind? BUAHAHA!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_3.fr: Ton prcieux peuple apprcie les consquences de ton invasion sur leurs terres ? C'est qui, l'ennemi, ici ? BWAHAHA !
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_3.it: Le tue persone preziose apprezzano come la tua invasione ha devastato le loro terre? Chi  il nemico qui? BWAHAHA!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_3.es: Dime algo: tu querida gente aprecia que hayas arrasado sus tierras durante la invasin? Quin es el verdadero enemigo? JUAS, JUAS!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_3.pt: O teu querido povo aprecia a forma como a invaso destruiu as suas terras? Ento quem  o imimigo? BWAHAHA!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_3.tr: Senin deerli halkn, yaptn istilann onlarn topraklarna verdii zarar da takdir ediyor mu? Kimmi buradaki dman imdi? AHAHAH!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_3.id: Apakah rakyat sipilmu yang berharga itu menghargai invasimu telah merusakkan tanah mereka? Siapa sebenarnya yang musuh di sini? HAHAHA!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_3.ms: Kau semua tak hargai bagaimana pencerobohan kau memusnahkan tanah mereka? Siapa musuh sekarang? BWAHAHA!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_4.en: Lives will always rebuild, once freed from the shackles of tyranny!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_4.de: Menschen rappeln sich immer wieder auf, sobald sie die Ketten der Tyrannei abgeworfen haben.
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_4.fr: Librs des chanes de la tyrannie, tout est possible !
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_4.it: La vita ricomincia sempre quando ci si libera dalla tirannia!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_4.es: La vida siempre florecer,pero tras verse liberada de las cadenas de la opresin y la tirana!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_4.pt: As vidas podem sempre ser reconstrudas, depois de as libertarmos das garras da tirania!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_4.tr: Zorbaln boyunduruundan kurtulduklarnda, hayatta kalanlar her zaman yeniden ina edebilirler!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_4.id: Kehidupan selalu bersemi kembali setelah belenggu kebebasan tangan tirani lenyap dari muka bumi!
CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_4.ms: Hidup akan terus dibina semula, selepas dibebaskan dari kuku besi!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_5.en: You're too late, Bragg. The avalanche has already begun and your forces are but pebbles in the way of our domination.
