D_S_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.pt: Encontra e destri a Casamata de Comando
D_S_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.tr: Komuta Snann yerini bulup yok edin

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL1.en: The townsfolk report that the pipe has brought diseases and famine to the region. We should follow it and trace the source.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL1.de: Die Stadtbewohner berichten, dass das Rohr Krankheiten und Ungeziefer in die Region gebracht hat. Wir sollten ihm bis zur Quelle folgen.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL1.fr: Les autochtones nous ont dit que le tuyau avait apport la maladie et la famine dans la rgion. Il faut le suivre et trouver sa source.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL1.it: I cittadini ci riferiscono che il condotto ha causato malattie e carestia nella regione. Dovremmo seguirlo fino a risalire al punto in cui ha inizio.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL1.es: Los ciudadanos afirman que la tubera ha trado el hambre y enfermedades a la regin. Tenemos que seguirla para localizar su origen.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL1.pt: O povo diz-nos que esse tubo trouxe doenas e fome  regio. Devamos segui-lo e descobrir a sua origem.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL1.tr: Kasaba halk, blgeye hastalklar ve al boru hattnn getirdiini sylyor. Onu izlemeli ve kaynan izini srmeliyiz.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL1.id: Warga kota melaporkan bahwa pipa telah menyebabkan penyakit dan kelaparan di wilayah ini. Kita harus menelusuri dan melacak sumbernya.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL1.ms: Penduduk bandar memberitahu bahawa paip itu membawa penyakit dan kebuluran ke kawasan ini. Kita perlu ikut paip ini ke sumbernya.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL2.en: These people have suffered enough. Id suggest you to provide them with some supplies.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL2.de: Diese Leute haben schon genug gelitten. Ich wrde vorschlagen, sie mit Wehrmaterial zu versorgen.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL2.fr: Ces gens ont dj trop souffert. Il faut leur fournir du ravitaillement.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL2.it: Queste persone hanno gi sofferto abbastanza. Ti suggerisco di dare loro dei rifornimenti.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL2.es: Esta gente ya ha sufrido bastante. Te aconsejo que repartas suministros.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL2.pt: Esta gente j sofreu o suficiente. Sugiro que lhes forneas alguns suprimentos.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL2.tr: Bu insanlar yeterince ac ekti. Onlara biraz malzeme vermeni neririm.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL2.id: Mereka sudah cukup menderita. Sebaiknya berikan perbekalan untuk mereka.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL2.ms: Orang-orang ini sudah cukup menderita. Saya cadangkan anda berikan sedikit bekalan.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL1.en: This was just a minor set back! You will never find the evil weap
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL1.de: Das war nur ein kleiner Rckschlag! Du wirst die bse Waff...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL1.fr: Tu n'as pas encore gagn ! De toute faon tu ne trouveras jamais l'arm
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL1.it: Non si tratta che di un rallentamento da nulla! Non troverai mai la nostra ar...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL1.es: No ha sido ms que una pequea complicacin! Nunca encontrars el arm...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL1.pt: Isto foi apenas um pequeno revs! Nunca encontrars a arma mal...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL1.tr: Bu sadece kk bir geri ekilme. Asla lmcl silahn yerini
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL1.id: Ini hanya sebuah kegagalan kecil! Kalian tidak akan menemukan sen
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL1.ms: Itu cuma kesilapan kecil! Anda takkan dapat menjumpai senja

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL2.en: Silence you stupid soldier! Don't give away our secret!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL2.de: Sei still, du dummer Soldat! Verrate unser Geheimnis nicht!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL2.fr: Tais-toi, imbcile ! Ne lui dis pas notre secret !
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL2.it: Silenzio, stupido soldato! Non svelare il nostro segreto!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL2.es: Idiota! Cllate, soldado! No cuentes nuestro secreto!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL2.pt: Silncio, soldado estpido! No contes o nosso segredo!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL2.tr: Sessiz ol seni aptal! Srlarmz ak etme!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL2.id: Diam, prajurit bodoh! Jangan bocorkan rahasia kita!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL2.ms: Diamlah, askar bodoh! Jangan bocorkan rahsia!

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL3.en: According to the documents we found from the ruins, the pipe is pumping toxic waste out from some kind of factory. We must hurry and follow the pipe!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL3.de: Laut den Dokumenten, die wir in den Ruinen gefunden haben, wird Giftmll aus einer Art Fabrik durch das Rohr gepumpt. Wir mssen uns beeilen und dem Rohr folgen!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL3.fr: Selon les documents trouvs dans les ruines, le tuyau libre des dchets toxiques d'une sorte d'usine. Il faut vite trouver sa source !
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL3.it: Stando ai documenti trovati nelle rovine, il condotto pompa rifiuti tossici che provengono da una specie di fabbrica. Dobbiamo sbrigarci e seguire quel condotto.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL3.es: Segn los documentos que hemos encontrado en las ruinas, la tubera est expulsando residuos txicos de una fbrica. Rpido, hay que seguir la tubera!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL3.pt: Segundo os documentos que encontrmos nas runas, o tubo despeja detritos txicos de uma espcie de fbrica. Temos de nos apressar e seguir o tubo!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL3.tr: Harabelerde bulduumuz belgelere gre, boru hatt bir tr fabrikadan zehirli atk pompalyor. Acele etmeli ve boru hattn takip etmeliyiz!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL3.id: Menurut dokumen yang kami temukan di puing-puing, pipa memompa keluar limbah beracun dari sebuah pabrik. Kita harus cepat melacaknya!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL3.ms: Mengikut dokumen yang kami jumpa dalam runtuhan, paip itu mengepam sisa toxic dari sebuah kilang. Kita mesti cepat dan ikut paip itu!

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL2.en: What is this I don't even...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL2.es: Qu es esto? No s qu...

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL3.en: Tubman, get a grip! Attack Force Desert Sting  engage the enemy!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL3.de: Tubman, mach schon! Angriffsstreitmacht Wstenstachel - greif den Feind an!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL3.fr: Tubman, reprends-toi ! Opration piqure du dsert ! Attaque l'ennemi !
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL3.it: Tubman, controllati! Forza dattacco Pungiglione del Deserto, ingaggiate il nemico!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL3.es: Tubman, clmate! Fuerza de ataque Aguijn del desierto, a por el enemigo.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL3.pt: Tubman, acorda! Fora de Ataque Ferro do Deserto  ataquem o inimigo!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL3.tr: Tubman, anla artk! Saldr Gc l nesi  dmana saldr!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL3.id: Tubman, posisi siaga! Serang Force Desert Sting - hadapi musuh!
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL3.ms: Tubman, fokus! Skuad Serangan Sengat Gurun - serang musuh!

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL4.fr: Matre, je n'ai pas confiance en Tubman.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL4.it: Capo, non mi fido di Tubman.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL4.es: Maestro, no me fio de Tubman.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL5.en: Dr. Pravus, you dont need to worry. He will destroy the enemy and you will have peace to complete your work.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL5.de: Dr. Pravus, mach dir keine Sorgen. Er wird den Feind zerstren, und du wirst Ruhe und Frieden haben, um deine Arbeit zu vollenden.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL5.fr: Dr. Pravus, ne vous inquitez pas. Il va dtruire l'ennemi et vous permettre de terminer votre travail.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL5.it: Dr. Pravus, non si deve preoccupare. Lui distrugger il nemico e lei avr modo di completare il suo lavoro con calma.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL5.es: Dr. Pravus, no te preocupes. Acabar con el enemigo y podrs terminar tu trabajo tranquilamente.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL5.pt: Dr. Pravus, no te deves preocupar. Ele vai destruir o inimigo e ters a paz de que precisas para acabares o teu trabalho.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL5.tr: Dr. Pravus, endielenmene gerek yok. Dman yok edecek ve sen de iini yapacak huzura kavuacaksn.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL5.id: Dr. Pravus, Anda tidak perlu khawatir. Ia akan menghancurkan musuh dan Anda dapat menyelesaikan pekerjaan dengan tenang.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL5.ms: Dr Pravus, jangan bimbang. Dia akan memusnahkan musuh dan anda akan dapat buat kerja tanpa diganggu.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_KILL_DIAL1.en: Stop it! I won't cry this time...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_KILL_DIAL1.de: Aufhren! Dieses Mal weine ich nicht ...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_KILL_DIAL1.fr: Ca suffit ! Cette fois-ci je ne vais pas pleurer
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_KILL_DIAL1.es: Basta! No voy a llorar esta vez
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_KILL_DIAL1.id: Hentikan! Saya tidak akan menangis kali ini
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_KILL_DIAL1.ms: Hentikan! Saya takkan nangis kali ini

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_1.en: Commander, we just intercepted another message...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_1.de: Kommandant, wir haben gerade eine weitere Nachricht abgefangen ...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_1.fr: Commandant, on a intercept un autre message
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_1.it: Comandante, abbiamo appena intercettato un nuovo messaggio...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_1.tr: Kumandan, az nce bir baka mesaj daha yakaladk
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_1.id: Komandan, kami baru saja menyadap pesan lainnya
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_1.ms: Komander, kami baru pintas satu lagi mesej

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_2.en: *TSK* Dr. Pravus, what is the estimation when the weapon is functional? *TSSK*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_2.de: *TSK* Dr. Pravus, wann wird die Waffe schtzungsweise funktionsfhig sein? *TSSK*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_2.fr: *TSK* Dr. Pravus, quand pensez-vous que l'arme sera oprationnelle ? *TSSK*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_2.it: *TSK* Dr. Pravus, quanto manca al momento in cui larma sar funzionante? *TSSK*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_2.es: *TSK* Dr. Pravus, cundo crees que el arma estar en funcionamiento? *TSSK*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_2.pt: *TSK* Dr. Pravus, qual  a tua estimativa para a arma estar operacional? *TSSK*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_2.tr: *TSK* Dr. Pravus, silah tam olarak ne zaman ilevsel hale gelir? *TSSK*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_2.id: *TSK* Dr. Pravus, kapan kira-kira senjata ini dapat berfungsi? *TSSK*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_2.ms: *TSK* Dr. Pravus, bila jangkaan senjata ini boleh digunakan? *TSSK*

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_3.en: *TSSK* won't be long anymore, master. End of the World is almost ready and *TSSSSK TSSSK TSS*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_3.de: *TSSK* ... wird nicht mehr lange dauern, Meister. "Ende der Welt" ist fast fertig und *TSSSSK TSSSK TSS*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_3.fr: *TSSK* a ne prendra plus trs longtemps, Matre. La fin du monde est presque prte et *TSSSSK TSSSK TSS*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_3.it: *TSSK* on manca molto, capo. "Fine del mondo"  quasi pronta e *TSSSSK TSSSK TSS*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_3.es: *TSSK* dentro de poco, maestro. El fin del mundo est casi listo y *TSSSSK TSSSK TSS*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_3.pt: *TSSK* j no falta muito, mestre. A Fim do Mundo est quase pronta e *TSSSSK TSSSK TSS*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_3.tr: *TSSK* ok uzun srmez efendim. "Dnyann Sonu" neredeyse hazr ve *TSSSSK TSSSK TSS*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_3.id: *TSSK* tidak lama lagi, Tuan. "Kiamat" hampir siap dan *TSSSSK TSSSK TSS*
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_3.ms: *TSSK* tak lama lagi tuan. "Penghujung Dunia" hampir sedia dan *TSSSSK TSSSK TSSS*

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_4.en: ...the rest is unreadable. Commander, we need to be fast.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_4.de: ... Der Rest ist nicht zu entziffern. Kommandant, wir mssen uns beeilen.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_4.fr: le reste est illisible. Commandant, il faut agir vite.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_4.es: el resto es incomprensible. Comandante, hay que actuar rpido.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_4.pt: ...o resto  incompreensvel. Comandante, temos de ser rpidos.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_4.tr: gerisi okunamyor. Kumandan, acele etmemiz lazm.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_4.id: sisanya tidak dapat dibaca. Komandan, kita harus cepat.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_4.ms: .selebihnya tak dapat dibaca. Komander, kita mesti cepat.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_5.en: Thats correct. In addition we have new information...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_5.de: Richtig. Auerdem haben wir neue Informationen ...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_5.fr: C'est exact. Nous avons galement reu de nouvelles informations.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_5.es: As es. Tambin tenemos ms informacin...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_5.pt: Correcto. Alm disso, temos novas informaes...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_5.tr: Doru. Ayrca yeni bir bilgiye sahibiz
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_5.id: Benar. Kita juga punya informasi baru
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_5.ms: Betul tu. Tambahan pula kita ada maklumat baru

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_6.en: Our agents report that the secret of Libery is a factory
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_6.de: Unsere Agenten berichten, dass das Geheimnis von Libery eine Fabrik ist ...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_6.fr: Nos agents signalent que le secret de Libery est une usine
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_6.it: I nostri agenti riportano che il segreto di Libertinia  una fabbrica
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_6.es: Nuestros agentes afirman que el secreto de Libery es una fbrica
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_6.pt: Os nossos agentes afirmam que o segredo de Libery  uma fbrica...
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_6.tr: Ajanlarmz, Libery'nin srrnn bir fabrika olduunu bildiriyor
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_6.id: Agen kita melaporkan bahwa rahasia Libery adalah sebuah pabrik
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_6.ms: Ejen kita melaporkan bahawa rahsia di Libery adalah sebuah kilang.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_7.en: A factory to produce weapons of mass destruction . It has to be found and destroyed.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_7.de: Eine Fabrik zur Produktion von Massenvernichtungswaffen. Sie muss gefunden und zerstrt werden.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_7.fr: Une usine qui produit des armes de destruction massive. Il faut la trouver et la mettre hors d'tat de nuire.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_7.it: una fabbrica che produce armi di distruzione di massa. Devessere trovata e distrutta.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_7.es: Una fbrica de armas de destruccin masiva. Tenemos que encontrarla y destruirla.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_7.pt: Uma fbrica de armas de destruio em massa. Temos de a encontrar e destruir.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_7.tr: Kitle imha silahlarn reten bir fabrika. Bulunmal ve yok edilmeli.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_7.id: Pabrik yang memproduksi senjata pemusnah massal. Pabrik ini harus ditemukan dan dihancurkan.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_7.ms: Kilang menghasilkan senjata pemusnah. Ia perlu dicari dan dimusnahkan.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_8.en: Buy the map for the middle region from the shop and see how deep the rabbit hole really is.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_8.de: Kaufe im Laden die Karte der mittleren Region, und sieh mal nach, wie tief der Kaninchenbau wirklich ist.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_8.fr: Achte la carte pour la zone du milieu dans le magasin et dcouvre cette tendue inconnue.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_8.it: Acquista la mappa della regione centrale dal Negozio e scopri quanto  seria la situazione.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_8.es: Adquiere el mapa de la regin norte en la tienda para llegar al fondo de este asunto.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_8.pt: Compra o mapa da regio centro na loja e descobre quo funda  realmente a toca do coelho.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_8.tr: Maazadan orta blge iin harita satn aln ve tavan deliinin aslnda ne kadar derin olduunu grn.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_8.id: Beli peta wilayah pusat di toko dan lihat seberapa luas wilayah yang harus Anda telusuri.
CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_8.ms: Beli peta untuk kawasan tengah dari kedai dan tengok berapa dalam lubang arnab ini.

MISSION_D_S_HORDE_DESC.en: Defend yourself against the enemy strikeforce and destroy them
MISSION_D_S_HORDE_DESC.de: Verteidige dich gegen die feindliche Streitmacht, und zerstre sie
MISSION_D_S_HORDE_DESC.fr: Dfends-toi contre les troupes ennemies et dtruis-les
MISSION_D_S_HORDE_DESC.it: Difenditi dalla truppa dattacco nemica e distruggila.
MISSION_D_S_HORDE_DESC.es: Defindete de las fuerzas especiales enemigas y acaba con ellas
MISSION_D_S_HORDE_DESC.pt: Defende-te da fora de ataque inimiga e destri-a
MISSION_D_S_HORDE_DESC.tr: Dman saldr gcne kar kendinizi koruyun ve onlar yok edin
MISSION_D_S_HORDE_DESC.id: Pertahankan diri dari pasukan musuh dan hancurkan mereka
MISSION_D_S_HORDE_DESC.ms: Pertahankan diri daripada pasukan serangan musuh dan musnahkan mereka.

MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_TITLE.de: Verschaffe die Zugang zur Region im Norden

MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_DESC.en: Go to the shop and buy the map of the middle region. You can get Enemy Intel from propaganda towers and enemy units.
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_DESC.de: Kaufe im Laden die Karte der mittleren Region. Du kannst Geheimdienstinformationen ber den Feind von Propagandatrmen und feindlichen Einheiten erhalten.
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_DESC.fr: Va dans le magasin et achte la carte de la zone du milieu. Tu peux obtenir des informations par les tours de propagande et les units ennemies.
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_DESC.it: Vai al Negozio e acquista la mappa della regione centrale. Puoi ottenere informazioni sul nemico dalle torri di propaganda e dalle unit nemiche.
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_DESC.es: Ve a la tienda y adquiere el mapa de la regin del norte. Puedes obtener inteligencia enemiga de las torres de propaganda y de las unidades enemigas.
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_DESC.pt: Vai  loja e compra a regio central. Podes obter Informaes sobre o Inimigo atravs de torres de propaganda e unidades inimigas.
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_DESC.tr: Maazaya girin ve orta blgenin haritasn satn aln. Propaganda kulelerinden ve dman nitelerinden Dman stihbarat elde edebilirsiniz.
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_DESC.id: Kunjungi toko dan beli wilayah di utara. Kamu dapat memperoleh informasi Musuh dari menara propaganda dan regu musuh.
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_DESC.ms: Pergi ke kedai dan beli kawasan tengah. Anda boleh dapat Risikan Musuh daripada menara propaganda dan unit musuh.

MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_COMPL.en: New region is open! Attack there and make us proud!
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_COMPL.de: Neue Region ist offen! Greif sie an, und mach uns stolz!
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_COMPL.fr: Une nouvelle zone est dbloque ! Attaque-la firement !
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_COMPL.it: La nuova regione  ora disponibile! Attacca e rendici orgogliosi!
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_COMPL.es: Nueva regin abierta! Atcala y haznos sentir orgullosos!
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_COMPL.pt: A nova regio est aberta! Ataca nessa regio e enche-nos de orgulho!
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_COMPL.tr: Yeni blge ak! Oraya saldr ve bizi gururlandr!
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_COMPL.id: Wilayah baru telah terbuka! Serang dan buat kami bangga!
MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_COMPL.ms: Kawasn baru dibuka! Serang ke sana dan banggakan kami!

D_S_BUY_MAP_OBJECTIVE_DESC.en: Buy the Map for the region in the north
D_S_BUY_MAP_OBJECTIVE_DESC.de: Kaufe die Karte der Region im Norden

MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_DESC.en: These people have suffered enough. Provide them with supplies.
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_DESC.de: Diese Leute haben schon genug gelitten. Versorge sie mit Wehrmaterial.
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_DESC.fr: Ces gens ont dj trop souffert. Il faut leur fournir du ravitaillement.
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_DESC.it: Queste persone hanno gi sofferto abbastanza. Dai loro dei rifornimenti.
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_DESC.es: Esta gente ya ha sufrido bastante. Reparte suministros.
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_DESC.pt: Esta gente j sofreu o suficiente. Fornece-lhes suprimentos.
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_DESC.tr: Bu insanlar yeterince ac ekti. Onlara biraz malzeme verin.
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_DESC.id: Mereka sudah cukup menderita. Berikan perbekalan untuk mereka.
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_DESC.ms: Orang-orang ini sudah cukup menderita. Berikan mereka bekalan.

MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_COMPL.en: It is important to keep the civilians happy. Good job!
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_COMPL.de: Es ist wichtig, dass die Zivilisten zufrieden sind. Gut gemacht!
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_COMPL.fr: C'est important d'aider les civils. Bon travail !
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_COMPL.it: importante che i civili siano contenti. Ottimo lavoro!
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_COMPL.es: Es importante mantener contentos a los civiles. Buen trabajo.
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_COMPL.pt: importante manteres os civis satisfeitos. Bom trabalho!
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_COMPL.tr: Sivilleri mutlu etmek nemli. yi iti!
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_COMPL.id: Ketentraman warga sipil harus diutamakan. Bagus!
MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_COMPL.ms: Adalah penting bagi memastikan orang awam gembira. Bagus!

D_S_OBJECTIVE_SUPPLY_DESC.en: Click on a town and provide any amount of supplies
D_S_OBJECTIVE_SUPPLY_DESC.de: Klicke auf eine Stadt, und stelle eine beliebige Menge an Wehrmaterial bereit
D_S_OBJECTIVE_SUPPLY_DESC.fr: Clique sur une ville pour lui fournir du ravitaillement
D_S_OBJECTIVE_SUPPLY_DESC.it: Clicca una citt cui inviare dei rifornimenti
D_S_OBJECTIVE_SUPPLY_DESC.es: Haz clic en una ciudad para repartir la cantidad deseada de suministros
D_S_OBJECTIVE_SUPPLY_DESC.pt: Clica numa cidade e fornece qualquer quantidade de suprimentos
D_S_OBJECTIVE_SUPPLY_DESC.tr: Bir kasabaya tklayn ve herhangi bir miktarda malzeme verin
D_S_OBJECTIVE_SUPPLY_DESC.id: Klik kota dan berikan perbekalan dalam jumlah berapapun
D_S_OBJECTIVE_SUPPLY_DESC.ms: Klik mana-mana bandar dan berikan sebanyak mana bekalan

MISSION_D_M_DIAL1.en: The intel we collected suggests that the weapon is almost ready. Follow the pipe and destroy the factory!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL1.de: Laut den von uns gesammelten Geheimdienstinformationen ist die Waffe fast fertig. Folge dem Rohr, und zerstre die Fabrik!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL1.fr: Les informations rcupres indiquent que l'arme est presque termine. Suivez le tuyau et Dtruis l'usine !
MISSION_D_M_DIAL1.it: Le informazioni raccolte indicano che larma  quasi pronta. Segui il condotto e distruggi la fabbrica!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL1.es: Segn la informacin obtenida, el arma est prcticamente lista. Sigue la tubera y destruye la fbrica!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL1.pt: As informaes que recolhemos sugerem que a arma est quase pronta. Segue o tubo e destri a fbrica!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL1.tr: Topladmz istihbarat, silahn oktan hazr olduunu sylyor. Boru hattn takip edin ve fabrikay yok edin!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL1.id: Informasi intel yang kami kumpulkan menunjukkan bahwa senjata hampir siap. Telusuri pipa dan hancurkan pabriknya!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL1.ms: Risikan yang kita kumpul mencadangkan bahawa senjata hampir tersedia. Ikut paip dan musnahkan kilang!

MISSION_D_M_DIAL2.en: Buahaha, but you can only try! You shall not pass!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL2.de: Buahaha, du kannst es ja versuchen! Hier kommst du nicht vorbei!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL2.fr: Hahaha ! Essayez tant que vous voulez, vous ne passerez pas !
MISSION_D_M_DIAL2.it: Buahaha, puoi provarci finch vuoi. Non passerai!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL2.es: Ja, ja, ja! Intntalo si quieres! No vas a pasar!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL2.pt: Buahaha, mas s podes tentar! No passars!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL2.id: Buahaha, kalian boleh mencoba, tapi kalian tidak akan berhasil!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL2.ms: Buahaha, anda boleh cuba saja! Anda takkan lepas!

MISSION_D_M_DIAL3.en: Boys, remember what we talked and trained.
MISSION_D_M_DIAL3.de: Jungs, denkt daran, was wir besprochen und trainiert haben.
MISSION_D_M_DIAL3.fr: Les garons, n'oubliez pas notre entranement
MISSION_D_M_DIAL3.it: Allora, ricordatevi la teoria e gli addestramenti pratici.
MISSION_D_M_DIAL3.es: Muchachos, recordad lo que hemos hablado.
MISSION_D_M_DIAL3.pt: Rapazes, lembrem-se do que falmos e treinmos.
MISSION_D_M_DIAL3.tr: ocuklar konutuumuz ve zerine altmz eyi unutmayn.
MISSION_D_M_DIAL3.id: Rekan-rekan, ingat diskusi dan latihan kita.
MISSION_D_M_DIAL3.ms: Askar sekelian, ingat apa yang kita bincang dan latih.

MISSION_D_M_DIAL6.en: Of course... they have no chance!
MISSION_D_M_DIAL6.id: Tentu saja mereka tidak akan berhasil!

CAMPAIGN_D_M_C1_DESC.en: Let's make sure that Doomsday won't come after all.
CAMPAIGN_D_M_C1_DESC.de: Wir mssen dafr sorgen, dass die Welt doch nicht untergeht.
CAMPAIGN_D_M_C1_DESC.fr: Empche la fin du monde d'arriver
CAMPAIGN_D_M_C1_DESC.it: Facciamo in modo che non arrivi il Giorno del Giudizio.
CAMPAIGN_D_M_C1_DESC.es: Vamos a encargarnos de que no llegue el Apocalipsis.
CAMPAIGN_D_M_C1_DESC.pt: Vamos l garantir que o Dia do Juzo Final afinal no chega.
CAMPAIGN_D_M_C1_DESC.id: Mari kita pastikan Kiamat tidak akan tiba.

MISSION_D_M_1_COMPL.en: Good job cutting down those tanks, Commander.
MISSION_D_M_1_COMPL.de: Die Zerstrung der Panzer war gute Arbeit, Kommandant.
MISSION_D_M_1_COMPL.fr: Les tanks sont limins. Bon travail, Commandant.
MISSION_D_M_1_COMPL.it: Ottimo lavoro, distruggere quei carri armati, comandante.
MISSION_D_M_1_COMPL.es: Bien hecho, comandante. As se acaba con unos tanques.
MISSION_D_M_1_COMPL.pt: Com trabalho a destruir aqueles tanques, Comandante.
MISSION_D_M_1_COMPL.tr: O tanklar ortadan kaldrmada iyiydiniz Kumandan.
MISSION_D_M_1_COMPL.id: Bagus sekali upaya melumpuhkan tank-tank itu, Komandan.
MISSION_D_M_1_COMPL.ms: Memang hasil yang bagus memusnahkan kesemua kereta kebal itu, komander.

MISSION_D_M_2_DESC.en: The people want to thank you for the supplies. Collect the money!
MISSION_D_M_2_DESC.de: Die Leute wollen dir fr das Wehrmaterial danken. Sammle das Geld ein!
MISSION_D_M_2_DESC.fr: Les autochtones veulent te remercier pour le ravitaillement. Rcupre l'argent !
MISSION_D_M_2_DESC.it: La popolazione vuole ringraziarti per i rifornimenti. Raccogli il denaro!
MISSION_D_M_2_DESC.es: La gente quiere darte las gracias por los suministros. Recoge el dinero!
MISSION_D_M_2_DESC.pt: O povo quer agradecer-te pelos suprimentos. Recebe o dinheiro!
MISSION_D_M_2_DESC.tr: Halk, malzemeler iin size teekkr etmek istiyor. Paray toplayn!
MISSION_D_M_2_DESC.id: Warga ingin berterima kasih kepadamu atas perbekalan yang diberikan. Kumpulkan uangnya!
MISSION_D_M_2_DESC.ms: Penduduk mahu berterima kasih untuk bekalan. Kutip wang!

MISSION_D_M_2_COMPL.en: Keep up the good work, Commander.
MISSION_D_M_2_COMPL.tr: Bu harika almaya devam edin Kumandan.
MISSION_D_M_2_COMPL.ms: Teruskan kerja yang cemerlang ini, Komander.

D_M_HORDE1_DIAL_PRE.en: AARRRGGHHH. The city is lost, but I'll bring in the big guns. You'll never make out of here alive!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL_PRE.de: AARRRGGHHH. Die Stadt ist verloren, aber jetzt sind die groen Knarren dran. Hier kommst du nicht mehr lebend raus!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL_PRE.fr: AAAAARRGHHH. La ville est perdue, mais je vais ramener l'artillerie lourde. Vous ne sortirez jamais d'ici vivants !
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL_PRE.it: AARRRGGHHH. Abbiamo perso la citt ma ritorner con le armi pesanti! Non ne uscirete vivi.
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL_PRE.es: AARRRGGHHH. Hemos perdido la ciudad pero ahora llega la artillera pesada. Nunca saldrs vivo de aqu!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL_PRE.pt: AARRRGGHHH. A cidade est perdida, mas vou usar as armas a srio. Nunca sairo daqui vivos!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL_PRE.tr: ehir kaybedildi, fakat byk silahlar oyuna sokuyorum. Buradan asla canl kamayacaksnz!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL_PRE.id: AARRRGGHHH. Kota ini berhasil direbut, tapi saya akan membawa senjata canggih. Kalian tidak akan keluar dari sini dengan selamat!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL_PRE.ms: AAAARGGHHHH. Bandar sudah dirampas, tapi saya akan balik dengan lebih kuasa. Anda takkan dapat lari dari sini hidup-hidup!

DM_HORDE_1_OBJECTIVE_2_TITLE.es: Destruye las tropas de asalto enemigas

D_M_HORDE1_DIAL.en: My beautiful army! Not fair! Mamaaaaa!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL.de: Meine schne Armee! Das ist nicht fair! Mamaaaaa!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL.fr: Ma belle arme ! C'est pas juste ! Mamaaaaan !!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL.it: Il mio bellissimo esercito! Non  giusto! Mammaaa!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL.es: Mi querido ejrcito! No es justo! Mam!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL.pt: O meu belo exrcito! No  justo! Maeeeeeeee!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL.tr: Benim gzel ordum! Hi adil deil! Anneciiim!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL.id: Pasukanku yang hebat! Tidak adil! Mamaaaaa!
D_M_HORDE1_DIAL.ms: Tenteraku yang cantik! Ini tidak adil! Mamaaaaa!

C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL1.en: Fine... You can keep the civilians, but you will never catch me!
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL1.de: Gut ... Du kannst die Zivilisten behalten, aber mich kriegst du nicht!
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL1.fr: Trs bientu peux garder les civils, mais tu ne m'attraperas jamais !
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL1.it: Bene, ti puoi tenere i civili, ma non mi prenderai mai!
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL1.es: No importa... Qudate con los ciudadanos, pero a m jams me atrapars.
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL1.pt: Est bem... Podes ficar com os civis, mas nunca me apanhars!
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL1.tr: Harika Sivilleri koruyabilirsin ama beni asla yakalayamayacaksn!
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL1.id: Baiklah Kalian dapat menyelamatkan warga sipil, tapi kalian tidak akan berhasil menangkapku!
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL1.ms: Baiklah. Anda boleh simpan orang awam tu, tapi anda takkan dapat saya!

C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL2.en: No, but I will catch you. You have failed me for the last time, Tubman.
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL2.de: Nein, aber ich werde dich kriegen. Du hast zum letzten Mal versagt, Tubman.
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL2.fr: Certes, mais moi je vais t'attraper. Tu m'as du pour la dernire fois, Tubman.
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL2.it: No, ma io prender te. Mi hai deluso per lultima volta, Tubman.
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL2.es: Pero yo s que te voy a atrapar. Me has fallado por ltima vez, Tubman.
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL2.pt: No, claro que te apanho. Falhaste-me pela ltima vez, Tubman.
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL2.tr: Hayr ama seni ben yakalayacam. Beni son kez baarszla urattn Tubman!
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL2.id: Tidak, tapi saya akan menangkapmu. Ini terakhir kalinya kamu mengecewakan saya, Tubman.
C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL2.ms: Tidak, tapi saya yang akan dapat anda. Anda telah gagal untuk kali terakhir, Tubman.

C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL1.pt: AAAARGH. Fizeste o McDuff ficar zangado!

C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL2.en: McDuff... Don't make me come there and stop them myself.
C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL2.de: McDuff ... Leg es nicht darauf an, dass ich dorthin komme und sie persnlich aufhalte.
C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL2.fr: McDuff Ne m'oblige pas  aller les arrter moi-mme.
C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL2.it: McDuff... Non mi fare venire l a fermarli io stesso!
C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL2.es: McDuff... No hagas que tenga que ir yo personalmente a detenerlos.
C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL2.pt: McDuff... No me faas ir a em pessoa e venc-los eu prprio.
C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL2.tr: McDuff... Beni oraya getirtme, gelirsem ben durduracam onlar.
C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL2.id: McDuff Jangan sampai saya datang ke sana dan berbuat sesuatu.
C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL2.ms: McDuffjangan buat saya datang ke sini dan halang mereka sendiri.

C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL1.en: All this work... fades away... like tears in rain... what can I do
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL1.de: Die ganze Arbeit ... verwischt ... wie Trnen im Regen ... Was kann ich nur tun ...
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL1.fr: Tout ce travail disparu comme neige au soleil que faire...
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL1.it: Tutto questo lavoro cancellato come lacrime nella pioggia cosa posso fare
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL1.es: Todos nuestros esfuerzos... Se desvanecen... Como lgrimas en la lluvia... Qu puedo hacer
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL1.pt: Este trabalho todo... desvanece-se... como lgrimas na chuva... o que posso fazer...
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL1.tr: Tm bu alma yamurdaki gzya gibi snp gitti Ne yapabilirim ki
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL1.id: Semua karyaku hilang seperti disapu hujan apa yang harus kuperbuat
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL1.ms: Semua kerja ini.hilangseperti air mata di kala hujan.apa boleh buat.

C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL2.en: My precious Doomsday Device, my dear Dee Dee destroyed
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL2.de: Meine wertvolle Weltuntergangs-Waffe, meine schne Wee-Wee ... zerstrt ...
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL2.fr: Ma belle arme de destructions massive ma Fin du monde dtruite...
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL2.it: Il mio prezioso Dispositivo Giorno del Giudizio, il mio DiGiG... distrutto
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL2.es: Mi adorado dispositivo del Apocalipsis, mi querido juguetito destrozado
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL2.pt: A minha querida Arma do Juzo Final, destruda
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL2.tr: Deerli Kyamet Cihazm, sevgili Cihazm yok oldu
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL2.id: Senjata Kiamatku yang berharga, hasil kerjaku selama ini hancur...

C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL3.en: Pravus, pull yourself together! Time to execute Plan B!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL3.de: Pravus, rei dich zusammen! Zeit fr "Plan B"!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL3.fr: Pravus, reprenez-vous ! Il faut excuter le plan B !
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL3.it: Pravus, datti un contegno!  ora di mettere in azione il piano B!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL3.es: Pravus, tranquilzate! Es hora de ejecutar el "Plan B"!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL3.pt: Pravus, recompe-te! Vamos pr o Plano B em aco!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL3.id: Pravus, kendalikan dirimu! Saatnya menjalankan "Rencana B"!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL3.ms: Pravus, tumpukan perhatian! Masa untuk melakukan Plan B!

C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL4.en: Retreat to the Strongpoint! Your lab is up and running here. I'll sent more troops in!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL4.de: Zieh dich zum Sttzpunkt zurck! Da ist dein Labor in Betrieb. Ich werde mehr Truppen entsenden!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL4.fr: Repliez-vous dans la Citadelle ! Votre labo fonctionne encore. Je vais y envoyer plus de troupes !
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL4.it: Ritirata al Forte. Il tuo laboratorio si trova l, perfettamente funzionante. Mander altre truppe!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL4.es: Retirada al Puesto fortificado! Tu laboratorio est a pleno rendimiento. Enviar ms tropas!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL4.pt: Retirada para Strongpoint! Tens l um laboratrio a funcionar. Vou enviar mais tropas!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL4.tr: Strongpoint'e ekil! Oradaki laboratuvarn salam ve faal. Oraya daha fazla birlik gndereceim!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL4.id: Mundur ke Titik Pertahanan! Laboratoriummu tetap beroperasi di sini. Saya akan mengirimkan lebih banyak pasukan!
C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL4.ms: Berundur ke Strongpoint! Makmal anda elok dan siap sedia di sini. Saya akan hantar lagi tentera!

D_M_OUTRO_DIAL1.en: The Doomsday Device is destroyed, but unfortunately the enemy slipped through our hands.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL1.de: Die Weltuntergangs-Waffe ist zerstrt, aber leider ist uns der Feind entkommen.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL1.fr: L'arme de destruction est dtruite, mais malheureusement l'ennemi nous a fil entre les doigts.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL1.it: Il Dispositivo Giorno del Giudizio  distrutto, ma purtroppo il nemico ci  sfuggito.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL1.es: Hemos destruido el dispositivo del Apocalipsis pero, por desgracia, no hemos atrapado al enemigo.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL1.pt: A Arma do Juzo Final foi destruda, mas infelizmente o inimigo escapou-nos.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL1.tr: Kyamet Cihaz yok edildi ama maalesef dman avularmzdan kayp gitti.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL1.id: Senjata Kiamat hancur, namun sayangnya musuh lepas dari genggaman kita.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL1.ms: Alat Doomsday musnah, tetapi musuh dapat melepaskan diri.

D_M_OUTRO_DIAL2.en: Commander, there is someone who wants to thank you.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL2.de: Kommandant, jemand mchte sich bei dir bedanken.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL2.fr: Commandant, quelqu'un veut vous dire merci.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL2.it: Comandante, c qualcuno che la vuole ringraziare.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL2.tr: Kumandan, sana teekkr etmek isteyen birisi var.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL2.id: Komandan, seseorang ingin berterima kasih kepada Anda.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL2.ms: Komander, ada seseorang yang mahu beri penghargaan kepada kamu.

D_M_OUTRO_DIAL3.en: Good job! What we do in life, echoes in eternity!
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL3.de: Gut gemacht! Was wir im Leben vollbringen, wird ewig in Erinnerung bleiben!
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL3.fr: Bon travail ! Ce que nous faisons dans cette vie rsonne dans l'ternit !
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL3.it: Ottimo lavoro! Quel che di buono facciamo in vita, riecheggia per leternit!
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL3.es: Buen trabajo! Lo que hacemos en esta vida, resuena en la eternidad!
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL3.pt: Bom trabalho! O que fazemos na vida, ecoa pela eternidade!
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL3.tr: yi iti! Hayatta yaptmz ey, sonsuzluktaki yanklardr!
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL3.id: Hebat! Apa yang kita lakukan dalam hidup akan diingat selamanya!
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL3.ms: Syukur! Apa yang dibuat di dunia, akan dibalas di dunia yang satu lagi.

D_M_OUTRO_DIAL4.en: Mrs. President, this is not over yet. Viceroy Vile and Dr. Pravus escaped to the northern region. I believe that we have a chance to imprison them and end this crazy war.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL4.de: Frau Prsidentin, es ist noch nicht vorbei. Vizeprsident Vile und Dr. Pravus sind in die nrdliche Region entkommen. Ich glaube, wir haben eine Chance, sie einzusperren und diesen verrckten Krieg zu beenden.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL4.fr: Madame la Prsidente, ce n'est pas encore termin. Viceroy Vile et le Dr. Pravus se sont chapps au nord. Je pense que nous pouvons les arrter et mettre fin  cette guerre insense.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL4.it: Signora Presidentessa, non  ancora finita. Viceroy Vile e il Dr. Pravus sono scappati verso nord. Credo che abbiamo la possibilit di catturarli e porre fine a questo folle conflitto.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL4.es: Sra. Presidenta, esto an no ha terminado. Viceroy Vile y el Dr. Pravus han huido a la regin norte. Creo que tenemos posibilidades de atraparlos y acabar para siempre con esta absurda guerra.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL4.pt: Senhora Presidente, isto ainda no acabou. O Vice-rei Vile e o Dr. Pravus fugiram para a regio Norte. Creio que temos uma oportunidade para os prender e acabar esta guerra demente.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL4.tr: Sayn Bakan, henz her ey bitmedi. Viceroy Vile ve Dr. Pravus kuzeydeki blgeye kat. nanyorum ki, onlar orada hapsetme ve bu lgn sava bitirme ansmz var.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL4.id: Bu Presiden, ini belum berakhir. Viceroy Vile dan Dr. Pravus melarikan diri ke wilayah utara. Saya yakin kita punya peluang menangkap mereka dan mengakhiri perang biadab ini.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL4.ms: Pn. Presiden, ini belum tamat. Wizurai Vile dan Dr.Pravus melepaskan diri ke bahagian utara. Saya percaya kita ada peluang untuk memenjarakan dia dan menamatkan perang yang gila ini.

D_M_OUTRO_DIAL5.en: Buy a map for the new region from the Shop. We must follow them! Their bad deeds cannot go unpunished.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL5.de: Kaufe im Laden eine Karte der neuen Region. Wir mssen ihnen folgen! Sie mssen fr ihre Verbrechen bestraft werden.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL5.fr: Achetez une carte pour la nouvelle zone dans le magasin. Nous devons les suivre ! Il faut qu'ils soient punis pour leurs crimes.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL5.it: Acquista una mappa della nuova regione dal Negozio. Dobbiamo seguirli! Le loro malefatte devono essere punite.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL5.es: Compra un mapa de la nueva regin en la tienda. Tenemos que seguirlos! Sus fechoras no pueden quedar impunes.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL5.pt: Compra um mapa da nova regio na Loja. Temos de os seguir! Os seus actos no podem ficar impunes!
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL5.tr: Maazadan yeni blge iin bir harita satn aln. Onlar takip etmeliyiz! Yaptklar ktlkler cezasz kalamaz.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL5.id: Beli peta wilayah baru di Toko. Kita harus menelusuri mereka! Perbuatan mereka tidak dapat dibiarkan begitu saja.
D_M_OUTRO_DIAL5.ms: Beli peta baru dari kedai. Kita mesti ekori mereka! Perbuatan jahat tidak boleh dibiar tanpa hukuman.

INTRO_D_N_DIAL_1.en: Here's the intel so far: The enemy has a very tough defensive line in this region. Also Viceroy Vile's HQ, called the Strongpoint is located in the northern part of the region.
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_1.de: Die Geheimdienstinformationen besagen Folgendes: Der Feind hat in dieser Region eine starke Verteidigungslinie. Auch das HQ von Vizeprsident Vile, das als Sttzpunkt bezeichnet wird, befindet sich im nrdlichen Teil der Region.
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_1.fr: Voil nos informations pour le moment : l'ennemi a une ligne de dfense trs importante dans cette zone. Le QG de Viceroy Vile, appel la Citadelle, se trouve au nord de la rgion.
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_1.it: Queste sono le informazioni raccolte finora: Il nemico ha una potente linea di difesa in questa regione. Inoltre, il QG di Viceroy Vile, chiamato il Forte, si trova nella parte pi a nord della regione.
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_1.es: Contamos con la siguiente informacin: El enemigo tiene una lnea defensiva slida en la regin. Adems, el cuartel general de Viceroy Vile, el Puesto fortificado, est situado en la parte norte de la regin.
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_1.pt: Aqui esto as informaes que recolhemos at agora: o inimigo tem uma forte linha defensiva nesta regio. Alm disso, o Quartel-general do Vice-rei Vile, chamado Strongpoint, encontra-se no Norte desta regio.
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_1.tr: u ana kadarki istihbarat: Dman, bu blgede ok salam savunulan bir hatta sahip. Ayrca Viceroy Vile'n, Strongpoint ad verilen Karargah, blgenin kuzey ksmnda saptand.
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_1.id: Berikut informasi intel hingga saat ini: Musuh memiliki barisan pertahanan yang sangat kuat di wilayah ini. Mabes Viceroy Vile yang disebut Titik Pertahanan juga berada di bagian utara wilayah ini.
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_1.ms: Inilah risikan setakat ini: Musuh ada garis pertahanan yang kukuh di kawasan ini. HQ Wizurai Vile, digelar Strongpoint terletak di bahagian utara kawasan ini.

INTRO_D_N_DIAL_2.en: We have a strong belief that Viceroy and Dr. Pravus have a new evil plan. The intel reports mention leads about something called Plan B
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_2.de: Wir glauben, dass der Vizeprsident und Dr. Pravus einen neuen, bsen Plan haben. In den Geheimdienstberichten ist von "Plan B" die Rede
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_2.fr: Nous pensons que Viceroy et le Dr. Pravus prparent quelque chose. Nous les avons entendu parler d'un "plan B"
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_2.it: Crediamo fortemente che Viceroy Vile e il Dr. Pravus abbiano un nuovo piano malvagio. I rapporti parlano di indizi riguardanti qualcosa chiamato Piano B.
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_2.es: Estamos convencidos de que Viceroy y el Dr. Pravus han trazado un nuevo y maligno plan. Segn nuestros informes, se llama el "Plan B".
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_2.pt: Acreditamos que o Vice-rei e o Dr. Pravus tm um novo plano malfico. As informaes mencionam algo chamado Plano B
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_2.tr: Viceroy ile Dr. Pravus'un yeni bir kt plan olduuna dair gl bir inancmz var. stihbarat raporlar, "B Plan" ad verilen bir eylerden bahsediyor
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_2.id: Kami yakin Viceroy dan Dr. Pravus memiliki rencana jahat yang baru. Laporan intel menyebutkan sesuatu yang dinamakan "Rencana B"
INTRO_D_N_DIAL_2.ms: Kami amat yakin bahawa Wizurai dan Dr Pravus ada pelan jahat baru. Risikan memberitahu tentang sesuatu yang dipanggil Plan B.

CAMPAIGN_D_N_C1_DESC.en: This is it, Commander. Finish these objectives and capture the enemy.
CAMPAIGN_D_N_C1_DESC.de: Das war's Kommandant. Erflle diese Ziele, und nimm den Feind gefangen.
CAMPAIGN_D_N_C1_DESC.fr: On y est, Commandant. Il faut remplir les objectifs et capturer l'ennemi.
CAMPAIGN_D_N_C1_DESC.it: Ci siamo, Comandante. Completa questi obiettivi e cattura il nemico.
CAMPAIGN_D_N_C1_DESC.es: Es la hora de la verdad, comandante. Cumple los objetivos y captura al enemigo.
CAMPAIGN_D_N_C1_DESC.pt: agora, Comandante. Cumpre estes objectivos e captura o inimigo.
CAMPAIGN_D_N_C1_DESC.tr: te bu Kumandan. Bu hedefleri yerine getir ve dman ele geir.
CAMPAIGN_D_N_C1_DESC.id: Ini saatnya, Komandan. Selesaikan misi ini dan tangkap musuh.
CAMPAIGN_D_N_C1_DESC.ms: Ini dia, Komander. Selesaikan semua objektif ini dan tangkap musuh.

DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_TITLE.de: Zerstre den Sttzpunkt von Vizeprsident Vile
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_TITLE.fr: Dtruis la Citadelle de Viceroy Vile
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_TITLE.it: Distruggi il Forte di Viceroy Vile
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_TITLE.es: Destruye el Puesto fortificado de Viceroy Vile
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_TITLE.pt: Destri o Strongpoint do Vice-rei Vile

DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.en: Locate and destroy Viceroy Vile's Strongpoint
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.de: Finde und zerstre den Sttzpunkt von Vizeprsident Vile
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.fr: Localise et dtruis la Citadelle de Viceroy Vile
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.it: Localizza e distruggi il Forte di Viceroy Vile
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.es: Encuentra y destruye el Puesto fortificado de Viceroy Vile
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.pt: Encontra e destri o Strongpoint do Vice-rei Vile
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.tr: Viceroy Vile'n Strongpoint'inin yerini bulup yok edin
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.id: Cari dan hancurkan Titik Pertahanan Viceroy Vile
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.ms: Cari dan musnahkan Strongpoint Wizurai Vile

DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_TITLE.fr: Dtruis la forteresse de combat au nord
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_TITLE.es: Destruye la fortaleza de batalla del norte
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_TITLE.pt: Destri a Fortaleza de Combate a norte

DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.en: Locate and destroy the northern Battle Fortress
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.de: Finde und zerstre die nrdliche Kampffestung
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.fr: Localise et dtruis la forteresse de combat au nord
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.it: Localizza e distruggi la grande fortezza a nord
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.es: Encuentra y Destruye la fortaleza de batalla del norte
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.pt: Procura e destri a Fortaleza de Combate a norte
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.tr: Kuzey Sava Kalesinin yerini bulup yok edin
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.id: Cari dan hancurkan Benteng Pertempuran utara
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.ms: Cari dan musnahkan Kubu Perang utara

DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.en: Locate the town of Dark Beach and liberate the people
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.de: Finde die Stadt Dark Beach, und befreie ihre Einwohner
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.fr: Localise la ville de Dark Beach et libre ses habitants
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.it: Trova la citt di Dark Beach e libera la popolazione.
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.es: Encuentra la ciudad de Playa Oscura y libera a sus habitantes
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.pt: Localiza a cidade de Dark Beach e liberta o povo
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.tr: Dark Beach kasabasnn yerini bulun ve halk zgrletirin
DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.id: Cari kota Dark Beach dan bebaskan penduduknya

MISSION_D_N_1_DESC.en: Disturb the enemy supplychain by destroying some Fuel Dumps
MISSION_D_N_1_DESC.de: Unterbreche die Nachschubkette des Feindes, indem du einige Treibstofflager zerstrst
MISSION_D_N_1_DESC.fr: Freine le ravitaillement ennemi en dtruisant des entrepts de carburant
MISSION_D_N_1_DESC.it: Sabota la catena di rifornimenti del nemico distruggendo alcuni depositi di carburante.
MISSION_D_N_1_DESC.es: Destruye depsitos de gasolina para mermar los suministros del enemigo
MISSION_D_N_1_DESC.pt: Perturba a linha de abastecimento destruindo alguns Depsitos de Combustvel
MISSION_D_N_1_DESC.tr: Baz Yakt Depolarn yok ederek dmann tedarik zincirini aksatn
MISSION_D_N_1_DESC.id: Kacaukan rantai perbekalan musuh dengan menghancurkan beberapa Depot Bahan Bakar
MISSION_D_N_1_DESC.ms: Ganggu talian bekalan musuh dengan memusnahkan beberapa Depot Minyak

DN_M1_OBJECTIVE_DESC.it: Distruggi 5 depositi di carburante del nemico

MISSION_D_N_2_COMPL.en: Outstanding! Those Guard Stations are not a problem anymore.
MISSION_D_N_2_COMPL.de: Hervorragend! Diese Wachposten sind kein Problem mehr.
MISSION_D_N_2_COMPL.fr: Formidable! Ces postes de garde ne seront plus un problme.
MISSION_D_N_2_COMPL.it: Eccezionale! Quelle torri non costituiscono pi un problema.
MISSION_D_N_2_COMPL.es: Genial! Esas torres de vigilancia ya no nos causarn problemas.
MISSION_D_N_2_COMPL.pt: Fantstico! Aqueles Postos de Guarda j no nos daro problemas.
MISSION_D_N_2_COMPL.tr: Olaanst! Bu Muhafz Garnizonlar artk sorun deil.
MISSION_D_N_2_COMPL.id: Luar biasa! Pos Jaga tersebut bukan masalah lagi.
MISSION_D_N_2_COMPL.ms: Luar Biasa! Stesen Pengawal itu bukan lagi masalah.

DN_M2_OBJECTIVE_TITLE.fr: Dtruis les postes de garde ennemies
DN_M2_OBJECTIVE_TITLE.it: Distruggi le torri di guardia del nemico

MISSION_D_N_3_DESC.it: Entra nella regione e conquista 70 caselle
MISSION_D_N_3_DESC.tr: eri girin ve 70 arazi paras ele geirin

MISSION_D_N_3_COMPL.en: Libery is soon ours! Good job!
MISSION_D_N_3_COMPL.de: Libery wird bald uns gehren! Gut gemacht!
MISSION_D_N_3_COMPL.it: Libertinia sar presto nostra! Ottimo lavoro!
MISSION_D_N_3_COMPL.es: Pronto nos haremos con Libery! Buen trabajo!
MISSION_D_N_3_COMPL.pt: Em breve Libery ser nossa! Bom trabalho!
MISSION_D_N_3_COMPL.id: Libery akan segera menjadi milik kita! Bagus!
MISSION_D_N_3_COMPL.ms: Libery akan jadi milik kita! Hebat!

D_N_BASE_DIALOG_1.en: Seems like our impenetrable line was penetrable after all. That changes nothing, Plan B is still active... They will all die like cockroaches!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_1.de: Anscheinend wurde unsere undurchdringliche Linie doch durchdrungen. Aber das ndert nichts, "Plan B" ist noch immer aktiv ... Sie werden alle wie Kakerlaken sterben!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_1.fr: On dirait bien que notre dfense impntrable a t pntre. Mais a ne change rien. Le plan B est toujours en action. Ils vont tous mourir comme des cafards !
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_1.it: Sembra che le nostre difese impenetrabili non lo fossero poi tanto. Non cambia nulla, il Piano B  ancora valido Moriranno come scarafaggi!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_1.es: Parece que nuestras impenetrables defensas s se podan penetrar. Pero todo sigue igual, el "Plan B" todava est en marcha... Morirn como cucarachas!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_1.pt: Parece que afinal a nossa linha impenetrvel era penetrvel. Isto no muda nada, o Plano B ainda est activo... Eles morrero como baratas!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_1.tr: Grne gre, szlamaz hattmz sonunda szlabilir kt. Bu hibir eyi deitirmez, "B Plan" hala geerli... Hepsi hamambcei gibi lecek!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_1.id: Ternyata barisan kita yang tidak tertembus dapat dikalahkan juga. Tidak masalah, "Rencana B" tetap berjalanMereka semua akan mati seperti kecoa!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_1.ms: Nampaknya sempadan kita bukanlah kukuh sangat. Tapi ia tak mengubah apa-apa. Plan B masih berjalan.mereka akan dipijak seperti lipas!

D_N_BASE_DIALOG_2.en: Commander, we found some documents in the base. Our experts analyzed them and it seems some kind of biological weapon. We must hurry to Viceroy Viles Strongpoint!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_2.de: Kommandant, wir haben in der Basis einige Dokumente gefunden. Unsere Experten haben sie analysiert. Es scheint sich um eine Art biologische Waffe zu handeln. Wir mssen schnell zum Sttzpunkt von Vizeprsident Vile!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_2.fr: Commandant, on a trouv des documents dans la base. Nos experts les ont analyss et ont trouv des signes de la prsence d'une arme biologique. Il faut vite aller  la Citadelle de Viceroy Vile !
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_2.it: Comandante, abbiamo trovato dei documenti nella base. I nostri esperti li hanno analizzati e sembra abbiamo a che fare con una qualche arma biologica. Dobbiamo sbrigarci a raggiungere il Forte di Viceroy Vile!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_2.es: Comandante, hemos encontrado varios documentos en la base. Segn nuestros analistas, se trata de un arma biolgica. Rpido, al Puesto fortificado de Viceroy Vile!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_2.pt: Comandante, encontramos alguns documentos na base. Os nossos especialistas analisaram-nos e parece uma espcie de arma biolgica. Temos de chegar depressa ao Strongpoint do Vice-rei Vile!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_2.tr: Kumandan, ste baz belgeler bulduk. Uzmanlarmz analiz etti ve bir tr biyolojik silaha benziyor. Viceroy Vile'n Strongpoint'ine yetimeliyiz!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_2.id: Komandan, kami menemukan sejumlah dokumen di pangkalan. Pakar kita menganalisisnya dan tampaknya dokumen itu adalah sejenis senjata biologis. Kita harus cepat menuju Titik Pertahanan Viceroy Vile!
D_N_BASE_DIALOG_2.ms: Komander, kami menjumpai beberapa dokumen di pengkalan. Pakar kami menganalisanya dan ia seperti satu senjata biologi. Kita harus segera ke Strongpoint Vile!

D_N_TOWN_DIALOG.en: The civilians thank us. Reports tell rumors about people getting sick mysteriously. This might have something to do with the mysterious Plan B
D_N_TOWN_DIALOG.de: Die Zivilisten danken uns. Es wurde berichtet, dass die Leute an einer geheimnisvollen Krankheit leiden. Das knnte etwas mit dem mysterisen "Plan B" zu tun haben ...
D_N_TOWN_DIALOG.fr: Les civils nous remercient. Mais des rapports signalent que des gens ont commenc  tomber mystrieusement malades. C'est peut-tre  cause de ce plan B
D_N_TOWN_DIALOG.it: I civili ci ringraziano. I rapporti parlano di persone che si ammalano misteriosamente. Potrebbe avere qualcosa a che fare con il misterioso Piano B
D_N_TOWN_DIALOG.es: Los ciudadanos estn agradecidos. Segn los informes, mucha gente est enfermando de manera misteriosa. Quiz este hecho est relacionado con el misterioso "Plan B"
D_N_TOWN_DIALOG.pt: Os civis agradecem-nos. H rumores de pessoas a adoecer misteriosamente. Isto pode ter a ver com o misterioso Plano B...
D_N_TOWN_DIALOG.tr: Siviller bize teekkr ediyor. Raporlar, insanlarn gizemli bir ekilde hastalanmaya balad hakkndaki dedikodulardan bahsediyor. Bu durumun, "B Plan" ile bir ilgisi olabilir
D_N_TOWN_DIALOG.id: Warga sipil berterima kasih kepada kita. Laporan menyebutkan adanya sejumlah orang yang sakit secara misterius. Ini mungkin berkaitan dengan "Rencana B" yang misterius
D_N_TOWN_DIALOG.ms: Orang awam berterima kasih. Laporan memberitahu khabar angin tentang orang tiba-tiba jatuh sakit. Ini mesti ada kaitan dengan Plan B.

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_1.en: Victory! I'll let our scientists contain this biological substance safely.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_1.de: Sieg! Unsere Wissenschaftler werden diese biologische Substanz sicher aufbewahren.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_1.fr: Victoire ! Je vais dire  nos scientifiques de neutraliser les substances toxiques.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_1.it: Vittoria! Far in modo che i nostri scienziati contengano questa sostanza in modo sicuro.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_1.es: Victoria! Nuestros cientficos asilarn la sustancia biolgica.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_1.pt: Vitria! Vou deixar os nossos cientistas conterem esta substncia biolgica em segurana.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_1.tr: Zafer! Bilimadamlarmzn, bu biyolojik maddeyi gvenli bir ekilde muhafaza etmesini salayacam.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_1.id: Menang! Saya akan meminta ilmuwan kita mengamankan zat biologis ini.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_1.ms: Berjaya! Saya akan biarkan saintis memindahkan bahan biologi ini dengan selamat.

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_2.en: Not again! All my plans... all my designs... ruined!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_2.de: Nicht schon wieder! Alle meine Plne ... alle meine Entwrfe - ruiniert!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_2.fr: Encore ?! Mes plans tout mon travail ruins
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_2.it: Di nuovo! I miei piani, i miei progetti, tutto rovinato!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_2.es: Otra vez no! Todos mis planes todas mis ideas frustradas!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_2.pt: Outra vez no! Todos os meus planos... todos os meus projectos... em runas!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_2.tr: Yine mi? Tm planlarm tm tasarmlarm... mahvoldu!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_2.id: Tidak! Semua rencanaku semua desainku hancur!

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_3.en: You have won this battle, Commander.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_3.de: Diese Schlacht hast du gewonnen, Kommandant.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_3.fr: Tu as gagn cette bataille, Commandant.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_3.id: Anda telah memenangkan pertempuran ini, Komandan.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_3.ms: Anda dah menang kali ini, Komander.

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_4.en: Viceroy Vile, I assume that you will now declare your unconditional surrender. Your plans have failed!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_4.de: Vizeprsident Vile, ich nehme an, dass du jetzt deine bedingungslose Kapitulation erklren wirst. Deine Plne sind gescheitert!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_4.fr: Viceroy Vile, j'imagine que vous tes prt  vous rendre. Vos plans ont chou !
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_4.it: Viceroy Vile, do per scontato che ora ti arrenderai senza condizioni. I tuoi piani sono falliti!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_4.es: Viceroy Vile, supongo que ahora te rendirs sin condiciones. Tus planes han fallado!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_4.pt: Vice-rei Vile, assumo que ests pronto para declarar a tua rendio incondicional. Os teus planos falharam!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_4.tr: Viceroy Vile, artk koulsuz olacan sanyorum. Planlarn baarsz oldu!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_4.id: Viceroy Vile, saya yakin kini kau akan menyatakan diri menyerah tanpa syarat. Rencanamu sudah gagal!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_4.ms: Wizurai Vile, saya jangka yang kamu mahu menyerah tanpa syarat. Semua rancangan anda gagal!

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_5.en: Really? Well, this is my answer
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_5.de: Wirklich? Tja, das ist meine Antwort ...
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_5.fr: Ah bon ? Alors voil ma rponse
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_5.it: Davvero? Mhhh, ecco la mia risposta...
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_5.es: En serio? Aqu tienes mi respuesta
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_5.pt: A srio? Bem, esta  a minha resposta...
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_5.ms: Yakah? Baik, ini jawapan muktamad saya.

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_6.en: Where did they disappear? General Bragg! Commander! Black Fox!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_6.de: Wohin sind sie verschwunden? General Bragg! Kommandant! Black Fox!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_6.fr: O sont-ils passs ? Gnral Bragg ! Commandant ! Black Fox !
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_6.it: Dove sono spariti? Generale Bragg! Comandante! Black Fox!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_6.es: Dnde se han metido? General Bragg! Comandante! Zorro Negro!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_6.pt: Para onde desapareceram? General Bragg Comandante! Black Fox!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_6.tr: Nereye kayboldu? General Bragg! Kumandan! Black Fox!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_6.id: Ke mana mereka menghilang? Jenderal Bragg! Komandan! Black Fox!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_6.ms: Ke mana mereka menghilang? Jeneral Bragg! Komander! Black Fox!

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_7.en: That slimy bastard! Come back and fight like a man!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_7.de: Dieser schleimige Bastard! Komm zurck, und kmpfe wie ein Mann!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_7.fr: Quelle poule mouille ! Reviens ici et bats-toi comme un homme !
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_7.it: Quel viscido bastardo! Torna qui e combatti!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_7.es: Maldito baboso! Vuelve y lucha como un hombre!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_7.pt: Aquele verme! Volta e luta como um homem!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_7.tr: Seni pis herif! Gel de bir erkek gibi dv!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_7.id: Penjahat licik itu! Kembali dan bertarunglah secara jantan!
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_7.ms: Si licik tu! Marilah, bersemuka seperti anak jantan!

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_8.en: Both Viceroy Vile and Dr. Patrus Pravus have escaped.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_8.de: Vizeprsident Vile und Dr. Patrus Pravus sind beide entkommen.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_8.fr: Viceroy Vile et Patrus Pravus se sont chapps.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_8.it: Viceroy Vile e il Dr. Pravus sono scappati.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_8.es: Viceroy Vile y el Dr. Patrus Pravus se han escapado.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_8.pt: O Vice-rei Vile e o Dr. Patrus Pravus fugiram.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_8.tr: Hem Viceroy Vile hem de Dr. Patrus Pravus kat.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_8.id: Viceroy Vile dan Dr. Patrus Pravus berhasil lolos.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_8.ms: Kedua-dua Wizurai Vile dan Dr Patrus Pravus dah melarikan diri.

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_9.en: Commander, it seems that this war is not over yet. Viceroy Vile and the evil Crimson Empire are still a threat to the world and humanity. We need to continue our struggle to restore the peace and happiness.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_9.de: Kommandant, anscheinend ist dieser Krieg noch nicht zu Ende. Vizeprsident Vile und das bse Purpur-Imperium stellen immer noch eine Bedrohung fr die Welt und die Menschheit dar. Wir mssen weiterkmpfen, um Frieden und Glck wiederherzustellen.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_9.fr: Commandant, on dirait bien que la guerre n'est pas encore termine. Viceroy Vile et le malfique empire carlate reprsentent encore une menace pour l'humanit. Nous devons continuer  les combattre pour rtablir la paix et le bonheur.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_9.it: Comandane, a quanto pare questa guerra non  finita. Viceroy Vile e il malvagio Impero Cremisi sono ancora una reale minaccia per il mondo e lumanit intera. Dobbiamo continuare la nostra lotta per ristabilire la pace e la serenit.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_9.es: Comandante, parece que esta guerra no ha terminado todava. Viceroy Vile y el malvado Imperio Carmes siguen siendo un peligro para el mundo y la humanidad. Tenemos que seguir luchando en nombre de la paz y la felicidad.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_9.pt: Comandante, parece que afinal esta guerra no acabou. O Vice-rei Vile e o malfico Imprio Vermelho ainda so uma ameaa para o mundo e para a humanidade. Temos de continuar a nossa luta para repor a paz e a felicidade.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_9.tr: Kumandan, grne gre bu sava henz bitmedi. Viceroy Vile ve eytani Kzl mparatorluk hala dnya ve insanlk iin bir tehdit. Bar ve mutluluu tesis etmek iin mcadelemize devam etmemiz gerekiyor.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_9.id: Komandan, tampaknya perang ini belum usai. Viceroy Vile dan Kekaisaran Crimson yang jahat masih menjadi ancaman bagi dunia dan umat manusia. Kita harus terus melanjutkan perjuangan untuk memulihkan perdamaian dan ketenteraman.
D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_9.ms: Komander, nampaknya perang belum tamat lagi. Wizurai Vile dan Empayar Merah Saga masih lagi mengancam dunia dan manusia. Kita perlu berusaha dalam perjuangan memulihkan keamanan dan kegembiraan.

DVILLAGE_DESC.en: The famous harbour town of the southern region. Port Marie is famous for it's delicious fish cuisines.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!
DVILLAGE_DESC.de: Die berhmte Hafenstadt der sdlichen Region. Port Marie ist bekannt fr delikate Fischgerichte.\n\nUntersttze die Zivilisten mit Wehrmaterial, dann wirst du mit Geld belohnt!
DVILLAGE_DESC.fr: La fameuse ville portuaire de la rgion sud de l'le. Clbre pour ses dlicieux plats de poisson.\n\nRavitaillez les habitants et ils vous rcompenseront avec de l'argent !
DVILLAGE_DESC.it: La famosa citt portuale della regione del sud. Port Marie  famosa per la sua deliziosa cucina di pesce.\n\nAiuta i civili e loro ti ricompenseranno con del denaro!
DVILLAGE_DESC.es: La famosa ciudad portuaria de la regin sur. Port Marie es clebre por sus deliciosos platos de pescado.\n\nEntrega suministros a los civiles y te recompensarn con dinero!
DVILLAGE_DESC.pt: A famosa cidade porturia da regio Sul. Port Marie  famosa pela sua deliciosa gastronomia de peixe.\n\nApoia os civis com Suprimentos e eles recompensam-te com dinheiro!
DVILLAGE_DESC.tr: Gney blgesinin nl liman kasabas. Port Marie, lezzetli balk mutfayla nl.\n\nSivillere malzeme destei salayn ve karlnda parayla dllendirilin!
DVILLAGE_DESC.id: Kota pelabuhan yang populer di wilayah selatan. Port Marie dikenal dengan hidangan ikannya yang lezat.\n\nBantu warga sipil dengan memberi Perbekalan dan mereka akan membalasnya dengan uang!
DVILLAGE_DESC.ms: Pelabuhan yang terkenal di bahagian selatan. Port Marie terkenal dengan masakan ikan yang enak.\n\nBantu orang awam dengan Bekalan dan mereka akan memberi wang!

DTOWN_DESC.en: Little town located south of the Mountains of Libery. It's known for it's annual Festival of Sand.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!
DTOWN_DESC.de: Eine kleine Stadt sdlich der Berge von Libery. Sie ist fr ihr jhrliches Sandfest bekannt.\n\nUntersttze die Zivilisten mit Wehrmaterial, dann wirst du mit Geld belohnt!
DTOWN_DESC.fr: Petite ville situe au sud des montagnes de Libery. Connue pour son Festival du Sable.\n\nRavitaillez les habitants et ils vous rcompenseront avec de l'argent !
DTOWN_DESC.it: Cittadina a sud delle Montagne di Libertinia.  famosa per lannuale Festival delle Sabbie.\n\nAiuta i civili con dei rifornimenti e loro ti ricompenseranno con del denaro!
DTOWN_DESC.es: Pequea ciudad situada al sur de las montaas de Libery. Conocida por celebrar todos los aos el festival de la Arena.\n\nEntrega suministros a los civiles y te recompensarn con dinero!
DTOWN_DESC.pt: Uma pequena cidade a Sul das Montanhas de Libery.  famosa pelo seu Festival da Areia anual.\n\nApoia os civis com Suprimentos e eles recompensam-te com dinheiro!
DTOWN_DESC.tr: Libery Dalarnn gneyinde yer alan kk kasaba. Yllk Kum Festivali ile tannr.\n\nSivillere malzeme destei salayn ve karlnda parayla dllendirilin!
DTOWN_DESC.id: Kota kecil yang terletak di selatan Pegunungan Libery. Kota ini dikenal dengan Festival Pasir tahunan.\n\nBantu warga sipil dengan memberi Perbekalan dan mereka akan membalasnya dengan uang!
DTOWN_DESC.ms: Bandar kecil di selatan Pergunungan Libery. Terkenal dengan Pesta Pasir.\n\nBantu orang awam dengan Bekalan dan mereka akan memberi wang!

DCITY1_DESC.en: Libery's second biggest city. It used to be a pirate town back in the days.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!
DCITY1_DESC.de: Liberys zweitgrte Stadt. Frher war sie mal eine Piratenstadt.\n\nUntersttze die Zivilisten mit Wehrmaterial, dann wirst du mit Geld belohnt!
DCITY1_DESC.fr: La deuxime plus grande ville de Libery. C'tait autrefois une ville de pirates.\n\nRavitaillez les habitants et ils vous rcompenseront avec de l'argent !
DCITY1_DESC.it: La seconda citt di Libertinia. Molto tempo fa era un covo di pirati.\n\nAiuta i civili con dei rifornimenti e loro ti ricompenseranno con del denaro!
DCITY1_DESC.es: La segunda ciudad ms grande de Libery. En el pasado era un punto de encuentro de piratas.\n\nEntrega suministros a los civiles y te recompensarn con dinero!
DCITY1_DESC.pt: A segunda maior cidade de Libery. Em tempos foi uma cidade de piratas.\n\nApoia os civis com Suprimentos e eles recompensam-te com dinheiro!
DCITY1_DESC.tr: Libery'nin ikinci en byk ehri. Gemite, bir korsan kasabas olarak bilinirdi.\n\nSivillere malzeme destei salayn ve karlnda parayla dllendirilin!
DCITY1_DESC.id: Kota terbesar kedua di Libery. Kota ini dulu adalah kota bajak laut.\n\nBantu warga sipil dengan memberi Perbekalan dan mereka akan membalasnya dengan uang!
DCITY1_DESC.ms: Bandar kedua terbesar di Libery. Pernah menjadi bandar lanun seketika dahulu.\n\nBantu orang awam dengan Bekalan dan mereka akan memberi wang!

DCITY2_DESC.en: Dark Beach is the capital of Libery. It has many famous historical sites.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!
DCITY2_DESC.de: Dark Beach ist die Hauptstadt von Libery. Dort gibt es viele historische Sehenswrdigkeiten.\n\nUntersttze die Zivilisten mit Wehrmaterial, dann wirst du mit Geld belohnt!
DCITY2_DESC.fr: C'est la capitale de Libery. Elle comporte beaucoup de sites historiques.\n\nRavitaillez les habitants et ils vous rcompenseront avec de l'argent !
DCITY2_DESC.it: Dark Beach  la capitale di Libertinia.  famosa per i siti di interesse storico.\n\nAiuta i civili con dei rifornimenti e loro ti ricompenseranno con del denaro!
DCITY2_DESC.es: Playa oscura es la capital de Libery. Cuenta con muchos lugares histricos.\n\nEntrega suministros a los civiles y te recompensarn con dinero!
DCITY2_DESC.pt: Dark Beach  a capital de Libery. Tem muitos locais histricos.\n\nApoia os civis com Suprimentos e eles recompensam-te com dinheiro!
DCITY2_DESC.tr: Dark Beach, Libery'nin bakentidir. Birok nl tarihsel blgeye sahiptir.\n\nSivillere malzeme destei salayn ve karlnda parayla dllendirilin!
DCITY2_DESC.id: Dark Beach adalah ibu kota Libery. Kota ini memiliki banyak situs bersejarah.\n\nBantu warga sipil dengan memberi Perbekalan dan mereka akan membalasnya dengan uang!
DCITY2_DESC.ms: Dark Beach ialah ibu kota Libery. Ada banyak tapak bersejarah yang terkenal.\n\nBantu orang awam dengan Bekalan dan mereka akan memberi wang!

DOOMSDAY_NAME.pt: Arma do Juzo Final  Estrutura Principal

DOOMSDAY_DEF_7.fr: Objets de fin du monde gnriques

DESERT_N_AREA_DESC.fr: Zone du nord avec de grandes villes
DESERT_N_AREA_DESC.it: Regione del nord con grandi citt

DESERT_M_AREA_DESC.fr: Zone du milieu des montagnes de Libery
DESERT_M_AREA_DESC.it: Regione centrale con le Montagne di Libertinia.
DESERT_M_AREA_DESC.es: Regin centro con las montaas de Libery
DESERT_M_AREA_DESC.pt: Regio Central com Montanhas de Libery

FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TITLE.it: Giorno del giudizio impedito, per ora!
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TITLE.es: Has evitado el Apocalipsis por ahora!
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TITLE.pt: Por agora o Juzo Final foi prevenido!
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TITLE.ms: Kiamat sudah dihalang buat masa sekarang!

FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TEXT.en: I stopped the evil plans of the Crimson Empire for now. Take this Water Pack and prevent the Doomsday.
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TEXT.de: Ich habe die blen Plne des Purpur-Imperiums vorerst vereitelt. Nimm diese Wasserladung, und verhindere den Weltuntergang.
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TEXT.fr: J'ai temporairement arrt les plans malfiques de l'empire carlate. Prends ce sac-rservoir et empche la fin du monde.
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TEXT.it: Ho fermato i malvagi piani dellImpero Cremisi, per ora. Prendi questo pacchetto acqua e impedisci il Giorno del Giudizio.
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TEXT.es: De momento, he frustrado los malvados planes del Imperio Carmes. Toma este paquete de agua y evita el Apocalipsis.
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TEXT.pt: Por agora derrotei os planos malficos do Imprio Vermelho. Aceita este Pacote de gua e impede o Juzo Final.
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TEXT.tr: Kzl mparatorluun hain planlarn imdilik durdurdum. Bu Su Paketini al ve Kyameti engelle.
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TEXT.id: Saya berhasil menggagalkan rencana jahat Kekaisaran Crimson untuk sementara. Ambil Paket Air ini dan cegah Kiamat.
FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TEXT.ms: Saya sudah menghentikan rancangan jahat Empayar Merah Saga buat masa sekarang. Ambil Pek Air ini dan hentikan Doomsday.

FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TITLE.en: We might have won the battle...
FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TITLE.de: Wir knnten die Schlacht gewonnen haben ...

FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TEXT.en: The battle on the desert has been won but the war goes on. Take this Water Pack and free Libery from its oppressors.
FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TEXT.de: Die Schlacht in der Wste ist gewonnen, aber der Krieg geht weiter. Nimm diese Wasserladung, und befreie Libery von den Unterdrckern.
FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TEXT.fr: On a gagn la bataille du dsert, mais la guerre continue. Prends ce sac-rservoir et libre Libery de ses oppresseurs.
FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TEXT.it: La battaglia per il deserto  vinta, ma la guerra continua. Prendi questo pacchetto acqua e libera Libertinia dai suoi oppressori.
FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TEXT.es: Hemos ganado la batalla del desierto pero la guerra no ha terminado. Toma este paquete de agua y libera a Libery del opresor.
FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TEXT.pt: A batalha no deserto foi ganha, mas a guerra continua. Aceita este Pacote de gua e liberta Libery dos seus opressores.
FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TEXT.tr: ldeki sava kazanld fakat sava devam ediyor. Bu Su Paketini al ve Libery'i zalimlerden kurtar.
FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TEXT.id: Pertempuran di gurun telah dimenangkan, namun perang masih berlanjut. Ambil Paket Air ini dan bebaskan Libery dari penjajah.

FREE_UNITS_EXPLANATION.en: Invite NEW allies to get these free Elite Units! You'll get one point on a unit once your friend accepts the ally request. You can invite as many friends as you like!\n\nThe Elite Eliminator awaits!

FREE_UNITS_STATUS_COMPLETED.en: Unit completed and added to your inventory!

FREE_UNITS_STATUS_IN_PROGRESS.en: Invite more allies to complete this unit!

FREE_UNITS_STATUS_LOCKED.en: Complete the above free units to unlock this free unit!

FREE_UNITS_POPUP_DESC.en: Good work, Soldier! Inviting those Allies got you rewarded with free units! You can access them from your inventory!

MYSTERY_CRATE_DESC.en: You don't know what's in until you open it, but it sure will be something good!

BUY_NW_MAP_DESC.en: Go to the shop and buy the North West region map.

INTRO_NW_DIALOG_1.en: Come, Commander... Let the die be cast and come across...

INTRO_NW_DIALOG_2.en: There is only death for your beyond the mountains.

INTRO_NW_DIALOG_4.en: Commander, buy a map from the shop and take us in.

INTRO_NW_DIALOG_5.en: I suggest that you buy the map of the western region first. The defences there are weaker and we should be able to gain the initiative.

NW_C1_DESC.en: The attack has been commenced. Push through the mountains, liberate the city of Wesserness and get rid of any enemy presence.

NW_C1_OBJC_2_DESC.en: Attack and liberate the town of Wesserness

NW_DIALOG_TESLA.en: My equipment! Trashed again! You'll pay for that!

NW_DIALOG_CITY.en: Troops! Commence counter-attack. Conquer the city back, no matter what the cost!

NW_DIALOG_ENEMY1.en: Alpha one and two, come in...

NW_DIALOG_ENEMY2.en: Bravo one, Bravo two? Anyone? Come in, over.

OUTRO_NW_DIALOG_1.en: Pravus, how is our surprise going along?

OUTRO_NW_DIALOG_2.en: My Lord! The defensive shield is up and running and the Droids are operational. Just keep the enemy away from the generator...

OUTRO_NW_DIALOG_3.en: Hmm, that didn't sound good. We need to be careful when advancing to the east. Go to the shop and buy a new map.

BUY_NC_MAP_DESC.en: It is time to buy a new map from the Shop and push towards eastern regions

INTRO_NC_DIALOG_1.en: Let's see how you survive this! PRAVUS! ACTIVATE DROIDS!

INTRO_NC_DIALOG_2.en: At once! Come and meet your maker, Commander

NC_C1_DESC.en: Investigate the Middle Region and find out what those Droids are about. On the way, clear the area of enemies.

NC_C1_OBJC_1_DESC.en: Destroy 15 Droids that are spawning from the weapon

NC_DIALOG_DROIDS.en: You can kill the droids all you want, we have practically infinite reserve of those!

NC_DIALOG_ENEMIES2.en: Prepare yourself, Commander. Vile is coming in with force!

NC_DIALOG_TESLA.en: Why do you always break everything I build?

OUTRO_NC_DIALOG_1.en: We need to disable the shield somehow!

OUTRO_NC_DIALOG_2.en: A shield as powerful as that requires bigger generator. I'm suspecting that it is located in the region to the east!

OUTRO_NC_DIALOG_3.en: You know what to do Commander... Go to the shop and buy the map!

BUY_NE_MAP_DESC.en: Go to the shop and buy the map to the East

BUY_NE_MAP_COMPL.en: Well done, Commander. It's time to disable that generator!

INTRO_NE_DIALOG_1.en: Concentrate your efforts in locating and destroying the generator and keeping the droids down.

INTRO_NE_DIALOG_2.en: Master! They are getting closer the generator. It's the only weak point in the weapon...

INTRO_NE_DIALOG_3.en: Don't worry, they are now battling against our Eastern Army and the Droids. Let them try!

NE_C1_DESC.en: Destroy the Power Generator to disable the Railgun shield, allowing a direct attack.

NE_C1_OBJC_1_DESC.en: Locate the Generator from the Eastern region and destroy it

OUTRO_NE_DIALOG_1.en: Fluctuation in the capacitor exceeding critical levels. The generator is going down! Run for your lives! It's gonna go boom!

OUTRO_NE_DIALOG_2.en: Fix your units and attack the weapon! Remember to use fire missions too!

OUTRO_NE_DIALOG_3.en: The shields matter little to us. The Weapon has ridiculous amounts of armor in it. You will never be able to destroy it!

NC_C2_DESC.en: The weapon consists of multiple, autonomous parts. Destroy them all!

NC_C2_OBJC_1_DESC.en: Destroy the Main Structure of the weapon

NC_C2_OBJC_4_DESC.en: Destroy the Close Area Reaction Unit

NC_MISSION_BAY_DESC.en: Destroy the Droid Bay's located in the front and rear of the weapon.

NC_DIALOG_BAY.en: MY beautiful Droids... Send in the Rocketeers!

NC_BAY_OBC_1_DESC.en: Destroy the Droid Bay facing West

NC_BAY_OBC_2_DESC.en: Destroy the Droid Bay facing East

OUTRO_NC_2_DIALOG1.en: Look at them run!  They are retreating further north!

OUTRO_NC_2_DIALOG3.en: Somehow I have this feeling that we'll be meeting Vile again soon...
